programme.title: The Reason for Monster Whitetails
programme.desc: This week we're hunting with our good friends from The Reason as they head out to try and get some monster whitetails.

programme.title: Carolina Dreamin'
programme.desc: This week, Steve Schicker travels to South Carolina to hunt with Pete Gutowski of Uslide Bowholder, this time for deer.

programme.title: Elk Fever
programme.desc: This week, we join Gerry Rightmyer as he goes on the elk hunt of a lifetime, finally getting drawn after 16 years.

programme.title: New Brunswick Bear Hunt - Part 1
programme.desc: This week the Forever Wild Outdoors cameras are filming in beautiful New Brunswick for black bear with outfitter Ben Savior.

programme.title: Deep in The Skinny
programme.desc: Capt. Nathan Chennaux reunites with old fishing buddy to put the new Towee Skiff to the test. Shallow water redfish beware!

programme.title: Cowboy Like You've Never Seen
programme.desc: Yes sir, Capt. Ed trades his Cuban coffee for some South Texas joe as Capt. Scott Null shows the Florida angler the saltier side of Texas.

programme.title: The Clam" Before the Storm"
programme.desc: Capt. Ed Zyak is joined by long time TV host and Banana River native Capt. Blair Wiggins to visit Blair's home waters to find the famed flats unrecognizable. Human impact and runoff have taken their toll, but Capt. Blair and others have a plan.

programme.title: Coastal River Chinook Salmon
programme.desc: Casting spinners and jigs for BC river chinook salmon

programme.title: Pacific Saltwater Bottom Fishing
programme.desc: Jigging spoons for BC coastal halibut and pacific cod

programme.title: Pacific Coho Salmon
programme.desc: Fishing lures and drifting jigs for coastal BC coho salmon

programme.title: Filling the Freezer
programme.desc: After a long 8 weeks the meat birds are finally ready for the freezer. Family and friends band together and join Ben & Nicole as they slaughter whats left of their chickens in hopes of being able to feed both them and Bens parents for the winter

programme.title: Winter Woes
programme.desc: Ben and Nicole have committed to a goal of self-sufficiency. Unfortunately, its proving harder than they thought. Homesteading isnt as glamourous as it may look online. Atlantic Canadian winters are proving more difficult than ever before

programme.title: Spring Cleaning
programme.desc: As winter thaws Ben & Nicole set out to tidy up the yard and prep the garden. With cleanup well underway they pick up a new honeybee hive in hopes of being able to pollinate their garden and reap some sweet, sweet homegrown honey

programme.title: Logan's Bear Blanket
programme.desc: Logan turns this bear into a rug

programme.title: Island Pheasant
programme.desc: Your host Steve Elmy is going to take you on an awesome trip to the most southern inhabited island in Canada for an epic pheasant hunt

programme.title: Sunny Skies Where the Dove Dies
programme.desc: Loaded with Kent shells we hunt a few different locations and share some tips on what to look for when you want to get out and sharpen your skills before the waterfowl season

programme.title: Arkansas Duck Hunting
programme.desc: The crew heads to the duck capital of the world with good friend Russell Roberson from Alpha Innovations

programme.title: The Midwest
programme.desc: his week Heath & Brandon head to the Midwest in pursuit of giant whitetails

programme.title: South Dakota
programme.desc: This week Clede Spooner and Matt Cowell head west in pursuit of two species they've never hunted

programme.title: Texas
programme.desc: Watch as Ted and Amber head to Texas for some prairie dog and hog hunting

programme.title: Nighttime Raccoon
programme.desc: The Green Way Outdoors team heads over to their friends at Jank's Pheasant Farm. They are having serious issues with raccoons killing their pheasants. So the guys do a a night time raccoon hunt in exchange for a little pheasant hunting

programme.title: Early Season Canada Goose
programme.desc: Kyle & Jeff meet up with their buddy Ray Hoody for the early Canada goose season in Michigan

programme.title: South Dakota Pheasant & Jumping Asian Carp
programme.desc: The Green Way Outdoors team head to the pheasant capital of America, South Dakota. They hunt for pheasants and then head to the Missouri River to partake in some aerial Asian carp bowfishing!

programme.title: Operation Elk
programme.desc: September is elk season in the Rockies and the boys are in search of their biggest bulls yet.

programme.title: Crazy Rut Hunting
programme.desc: November, the rut is on, and the Grigsby is home to some of the best whitetail hunting in the Midwest. Strap into your tree stand because you have to put the hours in to shoot a Booner

programme.title: Crazy Rut Hunting
programme.desc: November, the rut is on, and the Grigsby is home to some of the best whitetail hunting in the Midwest. Strap into your tree stand because you have to put the hours in to shoot a Booner

programme.title: Wildfire Devastation
programme.desc: Rich and Sandi talk about the wild fire on the line and show the devastation caused.

programme.title: Wood Day on the Trapline
programme.desc: It's wood day out on the trapline, and Rich and Sandi put some of the newly fire killed trees to good use. Then it’s off to check lynx and otter traps from last winter.

programme.title: The Eastern Cape of South Africa
programme.desc: This week on Americana Outdoors, we're on a journey back to South Africa where we'll take a look at a variety of adventures and what goes on behind the scenes on some hunts.

programme.title: Axis Hunting and a Waterbuck Adventure in South Africa
programme.desc: This week on Americana Outdoors, we're going to join Jeff Reynolds as he goes on a dream hunt for an axis buck and then we'll journey back to South Africa with Wade Middleton as he goes back into the field in search of a waterbuck.

programme.title: Hog Hunts and a Big Ten Point
programme.desc: This week on Americana Outdoors, we look at all the ways that you can hunt hogs and then we'll go on a whitetail adventure with Brian Flaherty of TenPoint Crossbows where he's going to encounter his best buck ever.

programme.title: Arctic Char: Tree River Staycation - Part 2
programme.desc: After a good night’s rest in the pouring rain, we head out early up river to the famous Presidential Falls and then back onto the hunt for an Arctic Char in full spawning colors.

programme.title: Lake Trout - Great Slave Lake
programme.desc: We take in the last morning of fishing before the long 300km boat ride home to Yellowknife, NT. The fish are not done yet and we get to show you what not to do, when battling a giant lake trout to the boat!

programme.title: Shore Fishn Northern Pike
programme.desc: Its September and Ryan jumps back into the boat with Captain Andrew Moore and they head out on another personal bucket list adventure for the elusive Inconnu and some giant pike.

programme.title: Fly Fishing the Grand Cascapedia
programme.desc: This week, Pierre and his buddy Pat are in Gaspesie, Quebec for some fly fishing at the legendary Grand Cascapedia River.

programme.title: New Brunswick Moose
programme.desc: This week, while Pierre is in Newfoundland, we go to New Brunswick to hunt some moose with JLR Trophy Bear Hunting

programme.title: Turkey Hunting
programme.desc: Pierre goes to the administrative region of Estrie to meet his fellow guide Samuel L'Heureux who will show him the basics of turkey hunting.

programme.title: Pure Passion Part 2 : Saskatchewan Black Bears
programme.desc: Join Brody and Amy Teale as they hunt and fish along the North Saskatchewan River with Pure Passion Outfitting.

programme.title: Pure Passion Part 1 : Saskatchewan Black Bears
programme.desc: Join Brody and Amy Teale as they hunt and fish along the North Saskatchewan River with Pure Passion Outfitting.

programme.title: Chasin' Whitetails: Manitoba Whitetail Deer
programme.desc: Join Troy Esau on an exciting journey as he tracks elusive mature whitetail deer throughout the Manitoba hunting season.

programme.title: Trophy Pintails in Oregon
programme.desc: Mario and the local Oregon guys get together for a late season hunt in the Pacific NW. They pull out the layout boats for some high-water tricks to shoot some trophy Pintails and other ducks.

programme.title: Cold Weather Ducks
programme.desc: Mario heads east to a few different states and ends up in Wyoming at the Weatherby Facility for a tour. To cap things off we get to head out on the river for a very cold and snowy mallard hunt, with a small side of honkers to enjoy.

programme.title: Wild West Ducks & Nebraska Snows
programme.desc: The FA crew heads out on the famed Columbia River in Oregon to chase some birds, miles of places for the birds to hide and some incredible scenery. Then we slide into a little trip we took to Nebraska to hunt with the guys at Whiskey Sloughs.

programme.title: Mom's Bear
programme.desc: Corey and his parents go bear hunting in the North Woods. It's moms first time chasing black bear.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Corey and his son Brody head to Kansas for an early season hunt. Unfortunately Mother Nature was not making things easy.

programme.title: Florida Forever - Part 1
programme.desc: Corey and the family head to Florida for an adventure.

programme.title: Texas
programme.desc: Watch as Ted and Amber head to Texas for some prairie dog and hog hunting

programme.title: Oklahoma City
programme.desc: Jameson Redding travels to the capital of Oklahoma to experience their legendary fishing opportunities.

programme.title: Delaware
programme.desc: Jameson Redding travels to Delaware to experience their legendary fishing opportunities.

programme.title: Maine-ly for the Gobblers - Part 2
programme.desc: Anthony and Chris are back in the beautiful state of Maine after big northern Tom's with Rugged Country Guide service. They've got two more tags to fill and the action is just heating up.

programme.title: Black Bear Dreams
programme.desc: This week our host Anthony Dickson spends time in the stand in pursuit of a big Ontario black bear and takes us back to relive some great hunts from the past.

programme.title: Turkey Tradition
programme.desc: Anthony and his family share the tradition of turkey hunting as new members are brought into the sport.

programme.title: Thunder Run
programme.desc: Jerrika hunts for turkey in her own region with friend and hunting guide Colton Vriesacker from Passion for the Pursuit Guide Services.

programme.title: Catching Up
programme.desc: Jerrika invites two of her friends to hunt pheasant at Exeter Game Farm located in Southern Ontario.

programme.title: Organized Chaos
programme.desc: Jerrika is excited to kick off her premier episode providing an inside look at her life, her family, her passions and the chaos that ensues as her worlds collide

programme.title: Armed and Dangerous: Expert Firearms Training and Techniques
programme.desc: Love your Red Dot, Battle Rifle Sights, Concealed Carry Considerations/High Point YC9, CQB

programme.title: Essential Firearms Training and Tips
programme.desc: Reload Roulette, PCP Airguns, APX A1 Carry/Kahr CT & CM Series, Slings

programme.title: Watch Your Six
programme.desc: EDC Routines, Marlin 1894 & 336, APX A1 Family/Magnum Research 1911, Cover vs Concealment

programme.title: Mountains of Ducks
programme.desc: In scenic Idaho with a mountainous backdrop, the Higdon Crew fInds flock after flock of ducks and even a goose or two!

programme.title: Great Lakes Region
programme.desc: Bryan hits the road and heads to Michigan to trap with J3 outdoors and Tom Miranda.

programme.title: Down In the Bayou
programme.desc: Bryan heads to Louisiana to trap the crawfish ponds.

programme.title: Stories from the Line
programme.desc: The Fur life crew reminisce about the year they had, including fisher hunting in New Hampshire over dogs with an Umarex Airgun.

programme.title: A Duck and Geese Hunt Opener
programme.desc: In this episode Claudio gets to hunt Ducks and big Canada Geese. It ended well but could have been a lot worse

programme.title: Early Season Panfish
programme.desc: Tyler and Sara hit the ice early in a brand-new season of SJTV and breakdown how locate and catch weed edge dwelling panfish.

programme.title: Foolin' Walleyes
programme.desc: We head north to Tamarack Island on LOTW in search of roaming walleyes under the ice. Covering water with the Finicky Fooler is huge when fish are scattered.

programme.title: Mid-Winter Crappies
programme.desc: Doing your homework in the fall can pay big dividends when it comes to catching giant slabs through the ice once the hardwater season starts.

programme.title: Looking Back '16 - '22
programme.desc: Highlighting some of our favourite memories after 6 years of filming! Weve all grown in so many different ways. What a WILD ride! Hope you enjoy the show!

programme.title: Old Mexico Giant Muley
programme.desc: edicated outdoor producer's short films from around the globe.

programme.title: Can You Hear Me Now?
programme.desc: Rick takes his friend Andy and his brother Michael after some Missouri bucks while chasing one himself!

programme.title: Florida By Day
programme.desc: We spend the daylight hours with the CVA marketing team hunting gators with 5L Outfitters and Brad and Adam break away with Captain Jeff Vickers to catch over 100 fish in just a few hours before their plane leaves!

programme.title: Florida By Night
programme.desc: We finish up our awesome trip in Tampa Bay with Twisted Limbs Bowfishing and our ministry banquet winner Jim and his kids get after stingrays. They also try to fill two gator tags the following night with 5L Outfitters.

programme.title: The Legend of Marino Ends
programme.desc: Jared has his best hunt ever on the River Farm, and Mike takes down the legend Marino

programme.title: Giant 8 Point
programme.desc: Rye Ludwig takes his first Iowa buck, a giant bodied 8-pointer. Max Mongrello finally tags a great deer on the last day of season.

programme.title: Tennessee Stud
programme.desc: Jared has yet another encounter with Diablo where only a few seconds separates a shot. Forrest Binkley takes a stud in Tennessee, and Jared and Max team up to harvest a few does.

programme.title: Ruvio Cordless Vacuum
programme.desc: Ruvio Cordless Vacuum 4pay $33 CanadaISCI: 558117CCH (800) 251-1275

programme.title: Offroad RVing / The Ultimate Fifth Wheel
programme.desc: We take you out for some extreme RVing starting with an offroad adventure that tests the toughest RV we’ve ever seen. Then we look at a fifth-wheel trailer like no other.

programme.title: Is a Park Model an RV? / Renting
programme.desc: an a mobile home that’s anything but mobile actually be considered an RV? Then, is your RV in the shop? Considering a different kind of RV? RV curious and don’t own one? The answer… RV rentals!

programme.title: RVing to Mexico
programme.desc: Some RVers avoid Mexico due to concerns about safety or complicated border procedures, but touring in a group makes the beauty and adventure of Mexico possible with ease.

programme.title: Mozambique Crocodile Safari
programme.desc: Buck & Max are on safari in Mozambique. The crew is after a huge 12 foot man eating crocodile in the Zambezi River. A look at the local native culture is also featured.

programme.title: The Firing Line
programme.desc: Three stories are featured. Buck shoots with a couple women, the history of the AR-15 rifle is showcased and a WW2 vet shares his weapons of war.

programme.title: Nicaragua Duck Hunt
programme.desc: Buck & Max visit Nicaragua to explore the country, visit the capital Managua and experience some exciting duck hunting on Lake Managua

programme.title: The Best Encounters of 2023
programme.desc: This week we take a look back at some of the best encounters of 2023. From predators to turkeys and Cape buffalo to screaming bulls, we cover the gamut of big game the world over

programme.title: Sharing Land Conservation
programme.desc: Rich talks about sharing the conservation of the land on the trapline and then a very cool otter and lynx check.

programme.title: Moose on the Menu
programme.desc: Greg's hunting season doesn't go according to plan, but hunting seldom does. On this week's episode Greg and his good friends Kiley & Hailey Topliss try to fill their freezers with big game.

programme.title: Best of Season 6
programme.desc: Relive the most thrilling moments in Prairie Pursuit Season 6! Join our hosts Greg, Calvin and Mike for this action-packed 'Best of' episode like never before.

programme.title: The Bigfoot Mirror
programme.desc: Ryan Willis and Joel Porter visit Algonquin Highlands to perform a new tactic on their night investigation to summon a Bigfoot.

programme.title: Pennsylvania Red Fox Trapping - Day 2
programme.desc: Ken Patula and his trapping partner Bob, have found success on their Pennsylvania trapline. Among the beauty of the mountains and fall colors, they encounter some interesting characters that appear through the foggy, mountain mornings.

programme.title: Agri-Trade Special
programme.desc: Agriculture technology and innovations at the Agri-Trade Equipment Expo in Red Deer, AB

programme.title: Illinois Whitetail
programme.desc: Every pastor needs to get away sometimes. The Rev gets away to Illinois for some rest and relaxation, and to hunt for whitetail.

programme.title: Ice Fishing Wisconsin
programme.desc: We travel to two famous ice fishing destinations in the state of Wisconsin to fish jumbo perch and chase whitefish

programme.title: Deep Woods Alberta Elk
programme.desc: mbark on an unforgettable hunting adventure with Ryan and Corey as they pursue Elk in Alberta's rugged wilderness. Plus, Keith MacDonald scored an Elk of a lifetime!

programme.title: Giant Alberta Archery Moose
programme.desc: An intense moose hunt you don't want to miss! Join Ryan Kohler and special guests as they pursue Moose in a unique setup in the Alberta bowzone

programme.title: Alberta Draw Tag Mule Deer
programme.desc: Embark on an extraordinary mule deer hunting adventure in Alberta with Ryan Kohler, Corey Cook, and Taylor Thompson. Follow the action as they pursue Corey's prized mule deer and Taylor's exquisite velvet deer.

programme.title: Women in the Wild
programme.desc: Step into the untamed world of \"Women in the Wild\" and follow Danielle and Darcy, two remarkable women who fearlessly pursue hunting on their own terms.

programme.title: Air Ivanhoe Adventures
programme.desc: Join Scott Stirling and Merle Parkin on their epic fishing and bear hunt adventure with Air Ivanhoe. Experience the Ontario wild like never before!

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: In this episode, we embark on a captivating journey as we follow Hunter through his first two seasons of Whitetail Hunting and his debut Black Bear season

programme.title: Whitetail Bow Hunting Across America
programme.desc: In this episode, we join Kevin on his first velvet whitetail hunt in Kentucky. We then join Wade in Central Texas as he meets up with an old friend to hunt whitetails in the Texas brush country.

programme.title: Whitetail Rut in Texas: Feast or Famine - Part 1
programme.desc: Wade and Steve are going after whitetail during the peak of the rut. This episode is as unpredictable as a buck during the rut and we can't wait to bring you all the action

programme.title: Best of Sullivan
programme.desc: Highlights from Sullivan Whitetail Ranch in Texas!

programme.title: Overcomers
programme.desc: Carson Presti has two hand injuries that she overcame to return to her quest for archery. Crystal Gibson joins her and has her own battle after fighting illness for 5 months. Two strong women overcoming.

programme.title: Big Texas Deer Monsters
programme.desc: Blue Collar Adventures gives away a dream hunt to one lucky fan. The winner and his best friend go hunt the famous Sullivan Whitetail ranch for monster bucks

programme.title: Exciting Look Back at HECS Moments
programme.desc: This week we open the vault and take a look back at some exciting HECS moments from past seasons. In this highlights episode we'll enjoy the compelling journey in understanding how far we can push HECS technology.

programme.title: Albino Bigfoot Family
programme.desc: Ryan Willis and Joel Porter travel to Algonquin Highlands to visit a property where white Bigfoots have been seen since the 1930s to the present day

programme.title: Alberta Bugle Barrage
programme.desc: Dedicated outdoor producer's short films from around the globe

programme.title: Heindls Fishtails
programme.desc: We make a trip to Northern Wisconsin for some good ol' fashioned tip-up fishing with Jason and Ashley Heindl of Heindls Fishtails Guide Service

programme.title: Moose Camp at Poplar Point
programme.desc: Join Shawna as she heads to Poplar Point Camp to hunt moose with friends, the Fransis family.

programme.title: Whitetail Madness Marathon 2022
programme.desc: The most thrilling hunts from our whitetail archives

programme.title: Forest Fires
programme.desc: Hosts Steve Hamilton and Kaylee Klassen chat with John Davies and Byron Wolf about the ongoing fires across the country.

programme.title: Missouri Cats, Coyotes and Coon
programme.desc: Join Matt Burson and his son Ethan as they pursue their passion of land trapping a mixed bag of critters in the state of Missouri. These two men are skilled, and theyll share their techniques with you today as the fur starts to pile up.

programme.title: Gators with a Twist
programme.desc: We kick off the show with Blaine’s opinion on people critiquing other people’s deer on social media. Then we head off to Florida where Blaine finds almost 10,000 new acres to look for gators.

programme.title: Pork, It’s What’s for Supper
programme.desc: Blaine is still in Florida and is looking to add pork to the menu. We also go behind the scenes on a different show and show you the hunt, then how it REALLY went down.

programme.title: Alaskan Salmon Run
programme.desc: Larysa Switlyk ventures off to Alaska to fill her freezer with salmon and shares her passion of fishing with Mark who was there to help film but later couldn’t take the fly rod out of his hand!

programme.title: Season 3, Episode 7
programme.desc: We’ve got a C21 update with Tracey Wilson, as well as some of the craziest clips we’ve had on the show ever!

programme.title: Extremely Unleashed in Texas
programme.desc: Larysa Switlyk hunts free range aoudad in west Texas which ends up being more of a challenge than she expected. Then she takes a group of friends on a hog control mission out of a helicopter!

programme.title: Patriot Warrior Whitetail Hunt
programme.desc: Hank Parker goes whitetail hunting with the Patriot Warrior Foundation

programme.title: 100 Degree Honkers
programme.desc: Honkers", "shortDescription": "Brad guides Claudio and 3 clients to 200 snow geese on one of the best hunts he has ever been on. Jason then guides Claudio and 5 clients to 27 big Canada geese and 3 specs on a hot afternoon in early September.

programme.title: Bigfoot and the Psychic
programme.desc: Ryan Willis, Joel Porter and the team meet up with psychic medium Jen Abra to investigate paranormal energy in a haunted forest

programme.title: Spruce Tree Root as Rope
programme.desc: Some Native Americans used the root of spruce trees as rope. Tune in to see Ryan Marshall demonstrate the technique.

programme.title: The Importance of Tripods
programme.desc: The tripod is the most important structure to learn, as it serves many purposes. Learn how to build one with Ryan Marshall

programme.title: Cattails: The Supermarket of the Swamp
programme.desc: All of the cattail is edible, at any time of the year there is at least one part that can be eaten. Watch to learn how and when to prepare cattails

programme.title: Big Tracks & Heavy Racks 2023
programme.desc: Weve decided to wrap up fall with our fan-favourite, 90-minute marathon, Big Tracks & Heavy Racks. This year's elk and moose hunt compilation brings you some mega giants, courtesy of The EDGE, Line of Sight TV, Bushnell Presents Prairie Pursuit, and more popular series.

programme.title: The Perfect Hunt
programme.desc: On this hunt Daryl guides 5 clients and Claudio to 48 ducks and 48 geese to wrap up the perfect trip!

programme.title: Meet the Bennettes on their Multi-Species South Dakota Line
programme.desc: Tune in for plenty of excitement as Matt and Nancy Bennette run their trapline. Matt is an old pro, while Nancy is new to the craft. Nancys anticipation and excitement is palpable as she wears her emotions on her sleeve

programme.title: Sweetgrass First Nation - Part 1
programme.desc: Join Shawna as she heads to Saskatchewan to hunt Sweetgrass First Nation with Lance owner of Battle River Cree Outdoors. (Part 1 of 3)

programme.title: PK Lures Walleye Fishing
programme.desc: We do a little bait testing with Curt Reeff, owner of PK lures. First we fish on the Missouri River then we head north to Manitoba, where Bryan Bogdan and Kurt test out some of the same baits and color combinations on Northern Manitoba walleyes

programme.desc: Dry field, lots of ducks and the best hide you’ll see this year! So much action that we had to split it into two parts. Don’t miss the first half of this epic hunt!"

programme.desc: The rutting action in South Texas really heats up as Steve of Yamaha Outdoors continues his pursuit of whitetail during the rut

programme.desc: "Calvin takes friends Luke Alberts and Darcy Lodoen on their first black bear hunt in Northern Saskatchewan

programme.title: Season 3, Episode 8

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark's uncle, Johnny Gibb, a famous rodeo rider, comes to visit. Mark idolizes his uncle, but Lucas soon discovers that Johnny is on the run from the law after robbing an express office, and is afraid that Johnny is a bad influence on young Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's time for the cowboys to ride into new pastures as they explore growing their cattle business in unexpected ways. Bubba has been making good money working for his father-in-law's company in Mississippi, but he realizes he'd rather be out of his office chair and back on his horse in Alabama. Cody is excited to be managing a big rodeo, but a steer mishap puts the future of his contract on the ropes. And, even though Booger has happily saddled up with Jaclyn, it's unfamiliar terrain for him when she starts adding a woman's touch to his bachelor pad. As the three cowboys get together to sort yearlings for a friend, they devise a plan for making BBQ sauce to expand their cooking skills and company.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Booger and Cody team up to pen a herd of cattle, but a stubborn cow takes refuge in a fishing hole, requiring some creative wrangling. The stress of maintaining a long-distance relationship leads Bubba and Kaley to move back to Alabama for good. Booger embraces his new role as a family man and enlists young Matthew to help surprise Jaclyn with a much needed home-improvement project. Cody helps Misty throw a beef-tasting party for potential buyers. As the guys ponder using their cowboy skills to open a steak house, they decide to get some on-the-job training by working a shift during the hectic dinner rush at a local eatery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas McCain and his son, Mark, arrive in North Fork to purchase a ranch. When Lucas enters a turkey shoot to win money for a down payment, he soon finds himself at odds with town villain Jim Lewis.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: When a land-hungry rancher sends his bullies to harass peace-loving Mormons into giving up their fertile valley, a lazy gunfighter with a very quick draw and amazing accuracy, along with his horse-thieving brother, come to the settlers' rescue.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Jimmy is hot on the trail of a killer that he has personal reasons for taking down. Jesse decides to tag along. Meanwhile, back at the station, the other riders are upset with Cody about a published story he wrote about them.

Kaz, a young man, trying to come to terms with his parents separation, finds himself pursued by a terrifying manifestation of his own anxiety. Trapped within his subconscious mind, he must navigate a treacherous labyrinth of seven doors, each representing a unique challenge…
Can he reconnect with his family and gain control of his life?

programme.title: 10pQ 19 - The Middleweights
programme.desc: A 16-man jiu jitsu tournament. Eddie Bravo has invited warriors from the top moons in the 10th Planet Jiu Jitsu system for a qualifier tournament at the Headquarters in Downtown Los Angeles. The winner will go on to compete on the big stage at Combat Jiu Jitsu Worlds

programme.title: 10th Planet Jiu Jitsu - 20 Years in Orbit
programme.desc: Discover the pivotal moments that defined 10th Planet Jiu Jitsu's journey, a revolutionary evolution to the art of Jiu Jitsu that forever changed the landscape of martial arts that continues to shape the world of grappling. Join us as we celebrate this momentous anniversary, paying homage to the visionaries and pioneers who propelled this art form to new heights. Don't miss this must-watch documentary that will leave you inspired and in awe of the remarkable journey of 10th Planet Jiu Jitsu.

programme.title: American Grappling - Seattle
programme.desc: American Grappling heads to Seattle, Washington. Coach Morgan heads to the world-famous Pike’s Market and get a taste of the Northwest. Our featured competitor is the black belt Nathan Orchard. Nathan is looking to make Team USA to tick the final box of his career…win a grappling world championship…but he’ll have to get past Eric Spence. Eric has wrestled his whole life and competed on a wrestling US World team. It’s the traditional clash of styles between wrestling and jiujitsu. Find out who’ll end up on top and secure their spot at the world team trials.

programme.title: American Grappling - St. Louis
programme.desc: On this episode of American Grappling, the Qualifiers for 2024 have officially started ! This episode we see what talent the midwest has to offer with the Qualifiers being hosted in St Louis. Experience the city, the people and of course grappling as the USA Grappling team begin to build their new team for the World Championships. Directed, shot and edited by Anthony Kadel Produced by The Grappling Network

programme.title: American Grappling Podcast- Ft. Dr. Ivan Rascon Aguilar
programme.desc: In this Episode of the AGF Podcast, Brandon Quick interviews Gastroenterologist Ivan Rascon - Aguilar, MD about the health benefits of the Carnivore Diet, how its changed Brandon’s life and how Dr. Rascon - Aguilar is helping hundreds reverse preventable diseases and how a dietary and lifestyle change can improve wellness and athletic performance. Keep an eye out for more American Grappling Federation content here on The Grappling Network.

programme.title: BJJ Classics - Grapplers Quest West Coast
programme.desc: Grapplers Quest was founded in 1996 and began the submission grappling fever throughout the martial arts world and set Grapplers Quest as the premiere submission grappling event. Check out these old school No Gi matches featuring UFC Champion B.J. Penn taking on Mike Cardoso- ADCC U.S. Trials Champion. Pioneering athletes like Marc Laimon, Dean Lister, Jeff ""Snowman"" Monson, Chris Brennan, Tony Desouza, Alexandre Dantas, Homer Moore, Alberto Crane, J.D. Penn, Garth Taylor and Sean Spangler. Don't miss the event that started a legacy in the sport of submission grappling and revoltionized ground fighting in the martial arts world."

programme.title: BJJ Classics - Grappling All-Stars
programme.desc: Grappling All Stars is a collection of the world's best grapplers in action on the mat from the OTM archives. Featuring; Renner Gracie, BJ Penn, Diego Sanchez, Jeff Glover, Dean Lister, and many more!

programme.title: BJJ Classics - Submissions 101 Chapter 2
programme.desc: Submissions 101 Chapter 2 features the top grapplers showing you their best setups and submissions. A new feature in this sequel includes submissions broken down into categories which include: arm attacks, chokes, leg attacks, triangles, and other attacks. These old school matches are a great learning tool for anyone beginning their submission training or advanced grapplers looking to add new tools to their game. 101 Submissions Chapter 2 includes over 1 year of competition footage from around the world compressed into 48 minutes of intense action from the greatest events in the globe.

programme.title: BJJ Trickster Episode 6
programme.desc: This Episode features technique breakdowns of Ryan Hall, Kron Gracie, Jeremiah Vance, Cora Sek, and Jon 'Thor' Blank.

programme.title: BJJ Trickster Episode 7
programme.desc: This episode includes breakdowns of Clark Gracie's and Baret Yoshida's Crucifixes, Nathan Orchard's signature move, The Dead Orchard and Marcelo Garcia's arm drag.

programme.title: BJJ Trickster Episode 8
programme.desc: This Episode breaks down the double buggy choke from 10pQ 19, Geo Martinez's twister, Genki Sudo's flying triangle, and Tarik Hopstock's Tarikoplata.

programme.title: BJJ Trickster Episode 9
programme.desc: This episode breaks down Keenan Cornelius' Reverse Omoplata, Craig Jones' Inside Sankaku, Lachlan Giles' heel hook attacks and Grace “The Silent Assassin” Gundrum.

programme.title: Black Sheep Boxing with Zack Moore - 10pATX
programme.desc: After struggling with addiction himself, Jeff Meadows opened Black Sheep Boxing along with his friend Sky Wood with the purpose of giving recovering addicts an opportunity to turn their lives around. Join 10th Planet ATX's Zack Moore as he visits Black Sheep Boxing to learn the art of boxing.

programme.title: Breaking -Pro Breaking Tour - NYC Battles
programme.desc: The Pro Breaking Tour brings the top 8 breakdancing teams to New York for an intense head-to-head competition. Watch as the world’s best dancers showcase their athleticism and artistry in a high-energy battle for the championship title

programme.title: Breaking - King Of Scratch
programme.desc: DJ Battles and community cut sessions - Scratching is a gateway into hip-hop for old and new generations, inspiring them to think outside of the box and to create synergy through music . We're throwing down this week, celebrating 50 years of Hip Hop and BBOY City's XXIX (29th Anniversary)."""

programme.title: ADCC - Denver Opens
programme.desc: The Opens make their way to the mile high city where the best martial arts from the US look to stake their claim for supremacy as the circuit heats up. In this heart-pounding instalment, we bring you all the action from the epic showdown held in the magnificent city of Denver. Former UFC Strawweight Champion of the World Rose Namajunas known for her exceptional martial arts abilities, Rose is now ready to put her skills to the ultimate test in the realm of grappling. Witness her transition from the cage to the mats, as she grapples her way through some of the most intense matches of her career. ADCC Opens superstar and prodigy 16-year-old phenom, Helena Craver, steps onto the mats to showcase her unparalleled talent. With her sights set on glory, she aims to conquer the teenage, adults, and absolute divisions a feat that has never been done before. In a clash of titans, long time elite grappler Ryan Aitkens, a formidable competitor in his own right, is set to go head-to-head against the multiple-time world champion, Mateus Lutes. Brace yourself for an explosive battle between these two grappling juggernauts, as they leave everything on the mats in pursuit of victory.

programme.title: CPI - Sean O'Malley Recovers with Stem Cells
programme.desc: Anthony Kadel and Michael Plaster go to The Cellular Performance Institute in Tijuana, Mexico to cover the UFC's #1 ranked Bantamweight, "Suga" Sean O'Malley and his Coach Tim Welch. Spend a day with Sean and Tim as they embark on the road to recovery at the premier stem cell hospital. Presented by The Grappling Network.

programme.title: CPI Podcast - Sean O'Malley & Tim Welch
programme.desc: CPI Stem Cell Co-Founder Scotty Nelson hosts episode 4 of The CPI Podcast with UFC all-star "Suga" Sean O'Malley and Tim Welch, both flying out from Phoenix, AZ for treatment at @CPIStemCells Sean came down to get stem cell injections in a knee that had been bothering him for years and Tim opted for shoulder injections and a full-body stem cell IV. These treatments have been changing the way combat athletes heal & recover and we are happy to have been able to serve these awesome guys!

programme.desc: American Grappling heads to Seattle, Washington. Coach Morgan heads to the world-famous Pike’s Market and get a taste of the Northwest. Our featured competitor is the black belt Nathan Orchard. Nathan is looking to make Team USA to tick the final box of his career…win a grappling world championship…but he’ll have to get past Eric Spence. Eric has wrestled his whole life and competed on a wrestling US World team. It’s the traditional clash of styles between wrestling and jiujitsu. Find out who’ll end up on top and secure their spot at the world team trials.

programme.title: American Grappling - St. Louis
programme.desc: On this episode of American Grappling, the Qualifiers for 2024 have officially started ! This episode we see what talent the midwest has to offer with the Qualifiers being hosted in St Louis. Experience the city, the people and of course grappling as the USA Grappling team begin to build their new team for the World Championships. Directed, shot and edited by Anthony Kadel Produced by The Grappling Network

programme.title: American Grappling Podcast- Ft. Dr. Ivan Rascon Aguilar
programme.desc: In this Episode of the AGF Podcast, Brandon Quick interviews Gastroenterologist Ivan Rascon - Aguilar, MD about the health benefits of the Carnivore Diet, how its changed Brandon’s life and how Dr. Rascon - Aguilar is helping hundreds reverse preventable diseases and how a dietary and lifestyle change can improve wellness and athletic performance. Keep an eye out for more American Grappling Federation content here on The Grappling Network.

programme.title: BJJ Classics - Grapplers Quest West Coast
programme.desc: Grapplers Quest was founded in 1996 and began the submission grappling fever throughout the martial arts world and set Grapplers Quest as the premiere submission grappling event. Check out these old school No Gi matches featuring UFC Champion B.J. Penn taking on Mike Cardoso- ADCC U.S. Trials Champion. Pioneering athletes like Marc Laimon, Dean Lister, Jeff ""Snowman"" Monson, Chris Brennan, Tony Desouza, Alexandre Dantas, Homer Moore, Alberto Crane, J.D. Penn, Garth Taylor and Sean Spangler. Don't miss the event that started a legacy in the sport of submission grappling and revoltionized ground fighting in the martial arts world."

programme.title: BJJ Classics - Grappling All-Stars
programme.desc: Grappling All Stars is a collection of the world's best grapplers in action on the mat from the OTM archives. Featuring; Renner Gracie, BJ Penn, Diego Sanchez, Jeff Glover, Dean Lister, and many more!

programme.title: BJJ Classics - Submissions 101 Chapter 2
programme.desc: Submissions 101 Chapter 2 features the top grapplers showing you their best setups and submissions. A new feature in this sequel includes submissions broken down into categories which include: arm attacks, chokes, leg attacks, triangles, and other attacks. These old school matches are a great learning tool for anyone beginning their submission training or advanced grapplers looking to add new tools to their game. 101 Submissions Chapter 2 includes over 1 year of competition footage from around the world compressed into 48 minutes of intense action from the greatest events in the globe.

programme.title: BJJ Trickster Episode 6
programme.desc: This Episode features technique breakdowns of Ryan Hall, Kron Gracie, Jeremiah Vance, Cora Sek, and Jon 'Thor' Blank.

programme.title: BJJ Trickster Episode 7
programme.desc: This episode includes breakdowns of Clark Gracie's and Baret Yoshida's Crucifixes, Nathan Orchard's signature move, The Dead Orchard and Marcelo Garcia's arm drag.

programme.title: BJJ Trickster Episode 8
programme.desc: This Episode breaks down the double buggy choke from 10pQ 19, Geo Martinez's twister, Genki Sudo's flying triangle, and Tarik Hopstock's Tarikoplata.

programme.title: BJJ Trickster Episode 9
programme.desc: This episode breaks down Keenan Cornelius' Reverse Omoplata, Craig Jones' Inside Sankaku, Lachlan Giles' heel hook attacks and Grace “The Silent Assassin” Gundrum.

programme.title: Black Sheep Boxing with Zack Moore - 10pATX
programme.desc: After struggling with addiction himself, Jeff Meadows opened Black Sheep Boxing along with his friend Sky Wood with the purpose of giving recovering addicts an opportunity to turn their lives around. Join 10th Planet ATX's Zack Moore as he visits Black Sheep Boxing to learn the art of boxing.

programme.title: Breaking -Pro Breaking Tour - NYC Battles
programme.desc: The Pro Breaking Tour brings the top 8 breakdancing teams to New York for an intense head-to-head competition. Watch as the world’s best dancers showcase their athleticism and artistry in a high-energy battle for the championship title

programme.title: Breaking - King Of Scratch
programme.desc: DJ Battles and community cut sessions - Scratching is a gateway into hip-hop for old and new generations, inspiring them to think outside of the box and to create synergy through music . We're throwing down this week, celebrating 50 years of Hip Hop and BBOY City's XXIX (29th Anniversary)."""

programme.title: The B Team- Who's Number One Part 2
programme.desc: Check out The B-Team getting ready for Who’s Number One competitions. Follow the squad as they weigh in, check in with the press, and make the final preparations before battle. Thanks for watching, keep it locked on The Grappling Network

programme.title: ADCC - Denver Opens
programme.desc: The Opens make their way to the mile high city where the best martial arts from the US look to stake their claim for supremacy as the circuit heats up. In this heart-pounding instalment, we bring you all the action from the epic showdown held in the magnificent city of Denver. Former UFC Strawweight Champion of the World Rose Namajunas known for her exceptional martial arts abilities, Rose is now ready to put her skills to the ultimate test in the realm of grappling. Witness her transition from the cage to the mats, as she grapples her way through some of the most intense matches of her career. ADCC Opens superstar and prodigy 16-year-old phenom, Helena Craver, steps onto the mats to showcase her unparalleled talent. With her sights set on glory, she aims to conquer the teenage, adults, and absolute divisions a feat that has never been done before. In a clash of titans, long time elite grappler Ryan Aitkens, a formidable competitor in his own right, is set to go head-to-head against the multiple-time world champion, Mateus Lutes. Brace yourself for an explosive battle between these two grappling juggernauts, as they leave everything on the mats in pursuit of victory.

programme.title: Flavours Of The Sea - Episode 2
programme.desc: In today's episode, we are meeting Chef Dimitri who has a special surprise prepared for us. He will join us on our boat to prepare a unique fish soup, and we are ready to share this delicacy with the people in the port. We will also be meeting Chef Kostas who has his own recipe for pasta with tuna. Come on board and try it out!

programme.title: Flavours Of The Sea - Episode 3
programme.desc: Chef Nikolaos is giving us a well-needed cooking lesson before jumping on board to prepare the recipe he has in store for us. He will also take the time to teach us how to find out whether if a fish is fresh or not before we go on and try the dish with the people from the port. Then, we are meeting with the young Chef Jason, who with only 19 years is the main chef at a 4-star hotel. He is cooking on board our boat, and we are excited to try out his dish.

programme.title: Inside Sailing - Episode 1
programme.desc: Inside Sailing - Episode 1

programme.title: Skeleton Sea
programme.desc: João and Xandi, two surfers in their early 50′s, have been working together for 25 years. They clean beaches and with the trash they pick they create the most stunning artwork. However, living as an artist and idealist in Portugal is not economically profitable and, therefore, not easy.Their family life is affected by the choices they make and their wish to raise awareness about the ever-growing pollution in our oceans. Skeleton Sea takes us on their personal journey to help people understand the importance of our oceans to help us take the step to change our habits to keep them clean. As all live comes from the sea, Skeleton Sea reminds us that this powerful force has the ability of taking it away from us as well.

programme.title: Sailing to the Games - Episode 5
programme.desc: Sailing to the Games - Episode 5

programme.title: Sailing Fever In Annapolis
programme.desc: Welcome to Annapolis!Maryland’s capital city and located on Chesapeake, its historic district includes houses from the 18th century. Besides its historical interest, the city is one of the most exciting places to go to in the United States for nautical sports as yearly hundreds of enthusiasts come here for recreational or competitive races and regattas. Host Lucia Metzbauer heads to the Chesapeake Bay to discover what makes it one of the USA's top sailing destinations. Be part of an exciting regatta, visit the prestigious Yacht Club, meet the locals to enjoy steam crabs and work on your balance with Yoga on a Paddleboard – so many different things going on in this charming seaport. Join Lucia for a journey into American maritime history and an exclusive look at the famous 2014 Annapolis Spring Sailboat Show.

programme.title: Kite Masters - Episode 1
programme.desc: In this first episode of 2017, we travel to the paradise beach of Pak Nam Pran, in southern Thailand for the first kite racing event of the year – the Asian Twin Tip Racing Championships. We also head south-east from Thailand to Indonesia, a country blessed with some of the best waves on the planet – and we meet up with pro kite wave surfers: Keahi de Aboitiz, Moona Whyte and Matt Elsasser. We visit another great place for kiting, Zanzibar, the pearl of the Indian Ocean, located east of Tanzania and from Zanzibar to Chile, to the big rocks of this incredibly wild coastline and consistently powerful waves. Finally, we move to Korea where the world’s top pro-riders faced off at the first round of the 2017 IKA Kitefoil Gold Cup.

programme.title: Kite Masters - Episode 2
programme.desc: In this episode we fly to Europe and descend on Italy’s notorious Gizzeria kiteboarding spot, where the riders really like to be Uncool – in a statement of “reverse kudos”. Thanks to its reputation for excellent kiteboarding conditions and a relaxing ambience, Hangloose Beach annually hosts some of the world's top events. We catch up with the 2017 IKA TwinTip Racing Slalom European Championship where the titles are closely fought among a line-up of almost 120 riders from 21 different countries. In addition, multiple Champion Oliver Bridge is going to introduce us to the basics of kite control.

programme.title: What Sup - Episode 3
programme.desc: On this week's episode we join comedian Daniel Woodrow and violin virtuoso Dr. Draw for a paddle. Daniel has been seen on Just For Laughs, CTV, Comedy Network and some more, so let's see if he has any fresh jokes ready for us as we try out some challenges on the water. Are you ready?

programme.title: What Sup - Episode 4
programme.desc: Welcome back for the fourth episode of What SUP! On tonight's episode we have actress Kimberly Sue-Murray, known for her recurring role in the Lizzie Borden Chronicles opposite Christina Ricci on Lifetime. She will join us for a chat onboard our paddleboards before heading the challenges head on. Let's go!

programme.title: America's Cup Insight - Episode 5
programme.desc: Emirates Team New Zealand take Bermuda by storm as Peter Burling knocks out James Spithill in the first four races. Now, it's an uphill battle for Oracle Team USA at the 35th America's Cup. On the tech specs, we unveil the secrets of speed and why Team New Zealand has delivered a better overall package on their powerful AC50 'Aoateroa'. Watch the full recap of the AC35 kickoff.

programme.title: America's Cup Insight - Episode 6
programme.desc: When the out-spending was impossible, out-thinking did the job. Emirates Team New Zealand has dominated the 35th America's Cup Match seven to one to become the new Defender. After nearly two decades, the end of both the Alinghi and Oracle Eras is here and the kiwis are back on the top of the world. We will watch the battles, highlights and comments of this historic victory.

programme.title: Les Voiles de Saint Tropez - Episode 2 - Meeting and Sailing at Les Voiles De St Tropez
programme.desc: Marking the end of the Mediterranean yachting season, Les Voiles de Saint Tropez will be back for its 20th edition. Close to 4,000 sailors and more than 300 sailing yachts will gather in St Tropez in early autumn for an action-packed programme of competitive racing and lively social events.

programme.title: H2O Racing: Aquabike World Championship - Episode 3 Olbia, ITALY
programme.desc: With 150 competitors from over 30 countries, the UIM ABP Tour is ready for another weekend of non-stop action with the elite riders, joined by new riders competing in the single events of the UIM ABP Aquabike World Championship. In this episode, we are ready to see all the ski action in the Grand Prix of Italy taking place in Olbia.Come join us in this beautiful holiday destination that attracted international riders for the world champion title.

programme.title: Stockholm Archipelago Raid
programme.desc: The Stockholm Archipelago Raid is for participants a unique orienteering race in Europe as it offers a mix of sport, nature and adventure to athletes. This archipelago is the largest in Europe, with 36,000 rocks, skerries and islands, as well as one of the most difficult for navigation. There are still islands and groups of islands where no sail race has ever passed due to their remote location or because they are bird or seal protection areas.Experienced sailors from all over the world gather in the heart of Sweden as it hosts the first F18 Raid World ever. Winners will be crowned as the best long distance F18 raid sailors in the world, marking history in this nautical sport.Watch the Stockholm Archipelago Raid on Nautical Channel and discover the limitless possibilities of this Raid for brave competitors that will race in these remote islands.

programme.title: Facing Waves - Episode 3 - Fort Myers
programme.desc: Facing Waves - Episode 3 - Fort Myers

programme.title: Facing Waves - Episode 4 - North Carolina
programme.desc: Facing Waves - Episode 4 - North Carolina

programme.title: Flavours of Venice - Episode 3
programme.desc: We have approached the end of the series, and in this final episode Andi will be experiencing the art of glass blowing on the island of Murano. Then, she will enjoy a vegan meal prepared on board that has been paired with coffee instead of wine. Let's dive into the flavours of Venice!

programme.title: Moana Waiwai
programme.desc: Moana Waiwai follows the Free Swim journey of wahine (woman) Ally Davey as she takes on 70km of open ocean around the stunning Coromandel coastline to bring awareness to the protection of New Zealand’s oceans.For over three days it does more than encapsulate stunning panoramas on the extraordinary scenario of New Zealand. It is also inspiring for people as we become aware of the natural beauty of the ocean so we can protect it before it is too late.This is an inspirational film, not an activist propaganda, that highlights exploration and the intrinsic benefits of getting wet and looking below the surface. In Moana Waiwai Ally Davey will champion endurance of her human spirit in this seemingly impossible task to achieve a higher goal: protection of the oceans.Be part of her adventure on Nautical Channel.

programme.title: Sailing to the Games - Episode 5
programme.desc: Sailing to the Games - Episode 5

programme.title: Sailing Fever In Annapolis
programme.desc: Welcome to Annapolis!Maryland’s capital city and located on Chesapeake, its historic district includes houses from the 18th century. Besides its historical interest, the city is one of the most exciting places to go to in the United States for nautical sports as yearly hundreds of enthusiasts come here for recreational or competitive races and regattas. Host Lucia Metzbauer heads to the Chesapeake Bay to discover what makes it one of the USA's top sailing destinations. Be part of an exciting regatta, visit the prestigious Yacht Club, meet the locals to enjoy steam crabs and work on your balance with Yoga on a Paddleboard – so many different things going on in this charming seaport. Join Lucia for a journey into American maritime history and an exclusive look at the famous 2014 Annapolis Spring Sailboat Show.

programme.title: What Sup - Episode 3
programme.desc: On this week's episode we join comedian Daniel Woodrow and violin virtuoso Dr. Draw for a paddle. Daniel has been seen on Just For Laughs, CTV, Comedy Network and some more, so let's see if he has any fresh jokes ready for us as we try out some challenges on the water. Are you ready?

programme.title: What Sup - Episode 4
programme.desc: Welcome back for the fourth episode of What SUP! On tonight's episode we have actress Kimberly Sue-Murray, known for her recurring role in the Lizzie Borden Chronicles opposite Christina Ricci on Lifetime. She will join us for a chat onboard our paddleboards before heading the challenges head on. Let's go!

programme.title: Kite Masters - Episode 1
programme.desc: In this first episode of 2017, we travel to the paradise beach of Pak Nam Pran, in southern Thailand for the first kite racing event of the year – the Asian Twin Tip Racing Championships. We also head south-east from Thailand to Indonesia, a country blessed with some of the best waves on the planet – and we meet up with pro kite wave surfers: Keahi de Aboitiz, Moona Whyte and Matt Elsasser. We visit another great place for kiting, Zanzibar, the pearl of the Indian Ocean, located east of Tanzania and from Zanzibar to Chile, to the big rocks of this incredibly wild coastline and consistently powerful waves. Finally, we move to Korea where the world’s top pro-riders faced off at the first round of the 2017 IKA Kitefoil Gold Cup.

programme.title: Kite Masters - Episode 2
programme.desc: In this episode we fly to Europe and descend on Italy’s notorious Gizzeria kiteboarding spot, where the riders really like to be Uncool – in a statement of “reverse kudos”. Thanks to its reputation for excellent kiteboarding conditions and a relaxing ambience, Hangloose Beach annually hosts some of the world's top events. We catch up with the 2017 IKA TwinTip Racing Slalom European Championship where the titles are closely fought among a line-up of almost 120 riders from 21 different countries. In addition, multiple Champion Oliver Bridge is going to introduce us to the basics of kite control.

programme.title: America's Cup Insight - Episode 5
programme.desc: Emirates Team New Zealand take Bermuda by storm as Peter Burling knocks out James Spithill in the first four races. Now, it's an uphill battle for Oracle Team USA at the 35th America's Cup. On the tech specs, we unveil the secrets of speed and why Team New Zealand has delivered a better overall package on their powerful AC50 'Aoateroa'. Watch the full recap of the AC35 kickoff.

programme.title: America's Cup Insight - Episode 6
programme.desc: When the out-spending was impossible, out-thinking did the job. Emirates Team New Zealand has dominated the 35th America's Cup Match seven to one to become the new Defender. After nearly two decades, the end of both the Alinghi and Oracle Eras is here and the kiwis are back on the top of the world. We will watch the battles, highlights and comments of this historic victory.

programme.title: Les Voiles de Saint Tropez - Episode 2 - Meeting and Sailing at Les Voiles De St Tropez
programme.desc: Marking the end of the Mediterranean yachting season, Les Voiles de Saint Tropez will be back for its 20th edition. Close to 4,000 sailors and more than 300 sailing yachts will gather in St Tropez in early autumn for an action-packed programme of competitive racing and lively social events.

programme.title: H2O Racing: Aquabike World Championship - Episode 3 Olbia, ITALY
programme.desc: With 150 competitors from over 30 countries, the UIM ABP Tour is ready for another weekend of non-stop action with the elite riders, joined by new riders competing in the single events of the UIM ABP Aquabike World Championship. In this episode, we are ready to see all the ski action in the Grand Prix of Italy taking place in Olbia.Come join us in this beautiful holiday destination that attracted international riders for the world champion title.

programme.title: Stockholm Archipelago Raid
programme.desc: The Stockholm Archipelago Raid is for participants a unique orienteering race in Europe as it offers a mix of sport, nature and adventure to athletes. This archipelago is the largest in Europe, with 36,000 rocks, skerries and islands, as well as one of the most difficult for navigation. There are still islands and groups of islands where no sail race has ever passed due to their remote location or because they are bird or seal protection areas.Experienced sailors from all over the world gather in the heart of Sweden as it hosts the first F18 Raid World ever. Winners will be crowned as the best long distance F18 raid sailors in the world, marking history in this nautical sport.Watch the Stockholm Archipelago Raid on Nautical Channel and discover the limitless possibilities of this Raid for brave competitors that will race in these remote islands.

programme.title: Inside Sailing - Episode 1
programme.desc: Inside Sailing - Episode 1

programme.title: Skeleton Sea
programme.desc: João and Xandi, two surfers in their early 50′s, have been working together for 25 years. They clean beaches and with the trash they pick they create the most stunning artwork. However, living as an artist and idealist in Portugal is not economically profitable and, therefore, not easy.Their family life is affected by the choices they make and their wish to raise awareness about the ever-growing pollution in our oceans. Skeleton Sea takes us on their personal journey to help people understand the importance of our oceans to help us take the step to change our habits to keep them clean. As all live comes from the sea, Skeleton Sea reminds us that this powerful force has the ability of taking it away from us as well.

programme.title: Discovering Halki
programme.desc: In the south-eastern corner of the Aegean, west of Rhodes, there is a cosy island, a truly untouched gem of the Dodecanese. It’s a realm of rock and absolute peace; an island with great nautical tradition and proud islanders with an innate warmth.If you are looking for a hidden paradise on earth, then you have found the right place. Greece is home to a small island called Halki. Majestic and mystical; ethereal; elegant yet unpolished; and truly authentic.In this episode, we will visit Halki’s capital, Emborio and we will explore, with captain George, all the natural hidden treasures of the island.We are set to discover deep caves, bask on Trahia and Kania beach, and explore Alimia islet. We will visit an abandoned village, learning more about its rich history, and scuba dive down to the sea floor to get closer to a legendary shipwreck.Still untouched by mass tourism, Halki is the perfect destination for relaxing holidays away from the bright lights or for a quick getaway from the island of Rhodes. Watch Discovering Halki to become part of this almost untouched territory that is worth visiting.

programme.title: Brilliant Corners Jamaica
programme.desc: The Caribbean is filled with places where tourism is rare or close to non-existent. However, there is so much potential for cultural and water sports tourism, they are called Brilliant corners. Nautical Channel is on a mission to explore the brilliant corners of the Caribbean.Going from Haiti all the way to Jamaica or Barbados, we will dive into these brilliant corners, many of them with no tourism at all. With a sustainable tourism approach, get ready to live a fully local experience on Brilliant Corners Jamaica while we practice water sports, taste the traditional local dishes and talk with the habitants of the area.On this occasion, we venture into Jamaica: the third-largest island of the Greater Antilles and Caribbean, home to famous personalities like Bob Marley or Usain Bolt. Through extreme surf travel and consequent writing and aestheticized by jazz, Sam Bleakley gives a voice to the brilliant corners of this country, revealing the character of the place by getting inside the mind of a coastline as much as people.Immerse yourself in the beauty of the yet to discover areas of the Caribbean, available on Nautical Channel.

programme.title: Breskell
programme.desc: Master wooden boat builder Olivier D. Huin is back with his crew of Arctic explorers, this time with a much bolder challenge. To take on the legendary Northwest Passages in his hand-built wooden boat; Breskell.In order to succeed the crew will have to brave 5,000 miles of Arctic storms, polar bears and a constantly moving maze of thick arctic sea ice. People have been trying to accomplish this task for the past 500 years, however only a handful of wooden boats have ever successfully made the trip throught this arid landscape.Find out whether if Breskell will be successful in their perilous path or will have to ask for assistance as the wooden boat gets stuck forever in the artic ice. Now available on Nautical Channel.Awards:Finalist – Ottawa Adventure Film Festival 2019. Grand Prize – Adventure Film Festival 2019.

Finally, we move to Korea where the world’s top pro-riders faced off at the first round of the 2017 IKA Kitefoil Gold Cup.

programme.title: Kite Masters - Episode 2
programme.desc: In this episode we fly to Europe and descend on Italy’s notorious Gizzeria kiteboarding spot, where the riders really like to be Uncool – in a statement of “reverse kudos”. Thanks to its reputation for excellent kiteboarding conditions and a relaxing ambience, Hangloose Beach annually hosts some of the world's top events. We catch up with the 2017 IKA TwinTip Racing Slalom European Championship where the titles are closely fought among a line-up of almost 120 riders from 21 different countries. In addition, multiple Champion Oliver Bridge is going to introduce us to the basics of kite control.

programme.title: What Sup - Episode 3
programme.desc: On this week's episode we join comedian Daniel Woodrow and violin virtuoso Dr. Draw for a paddle. Daniel has been seen on Just For Laughs, CTV, Comedy Network and some more, so let's see if he has any fresh jokes ready for us as we try out some challenges on the water. Are you ready?

programme.title: What Sup - Episode 4
programme.desc: Welcome back for the fourth episode of What SUP! On tonight's episode we have actress Kimberly Sue-Murray, known for her recurring role in the Lizzie Borden Chronicles opposite Christina Ricci on Lifetime. She will join us for a chat onboard our paddleboards before heading the challenges head on. Let's go!

programme.title: Les Voiles de Saint Tropez - Episode 2 - Meeting and Sailing at Les Voiles De St Tropez
programme.desc: Marking the end of the Mediterranean yachting season, Les Voiles de Saint Tropez will be back for its 20th edition. Close to 4,000 sailors and more than 300 sailing yachts will gather in St Tropez in early autumn for an action-packed programme of competitive racing and lively social events.

programme.title: H2O Racing: Aquabike World Championship - Episode 3 Olbia, ITALY
programme.desc: With 150 competitors from over 30 countries, the UIM ABP Tour is ready for another weekend of non-stop action with the elite riders, joined by new riders competing in the single events of the UIM ABP Aquabike World Championship. In this episode, we are ready to see all the ski action in the Grand Prix of Italy taking place in Olbia.Come join us in this beautiful holiday destination that attracted international riders for the world champion title.

programme.title: Discovering Halki
programme.desc: In the south-eastern corner of the Aegean, west of Rhodes, there is a cosy island, a truly untouched gem of the Dodecanese. It’s a realm of rock and absolute peace; an island with great nautical tradition and proud islanders with an innate warmth.If you are looking for a hidden paradise on earth, then you have found the right place. Greece is home to a small island called Halki. Majestic and mystical; ethereal; elegant yet unpolished; and truly authentic.In this episode, we will visit Halki’s capital, Emborio and we will explore, with captain George, all the natural hidden treasures of the island.We are set to discover deep caves, bask on Trahia and Kania beach, and explore Alimia islet. We will visit an abandoned village, learning more about its rich history, and scuba dive down to the sea floor to get closer to a legendary shipwreck.Still untouched by mass tourism, Halki is the perfect destination for relaxing holidays away from the bright lights or for a quick getaway from the island of Rhodes. Watch Discovering Halki to become part of this almost untouched territory that is worth visiting.

programme.title: Brilliant Corners Jamaica
programme.desc: The Caribbean is filled with places where tourism is rare or close to non-existent. However, there is so much potential for cultural and water sports tourism, they are called Brilliant corners. Nautical Channel is on a mission to explore the brilliant corners of the Caribbean.Going from Haiti all the way to Jamaica or Barbados, we will dive into these brilliant corners, many of them with no tourism at all. With a sustainable tourism approach, get ready to live a fully local experience on Brilliant Corners Jamaica while we practice water sports, taste the traditional local dishes and talk with the habitants of the area.On this occasion, we venture into Jamaica: the third-largest island of the Greater Antilles and Caribbean, home to famous personalities like Bob Marley or Usain Bolt. Through extreme surf travel and consequent writing and aestheticized by jazz, Sam Bleakley gives a voice to the brilliant corners of this country, revealing the character of the place by getting inside the mind of a coastline as much as people.Immerse yourself in the beauty of the yet to discover areas of the Caribbean, available on Nautical Channel.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Tour - Episode 5
programme.desc: GWA Wingfoil World Tour - Episode 5

programme.title: Ice Canoe Carnival Quebec
programme.desc: Rowing through icy currents in the cold is not for the faint of heart. However, every year competitors jump into their canoes to race in the Ice Canoe Carnival Quebec. The Canoe Race is a legendary competition that has been held since the Carnival's first edition. When the Québec Winter Carnival returned in 1955, ice canoe racing became once again an important annual event, and is now awaited by many in the Canadian city.Each year, several courageous teams compete in extremely freezing conditions a tumultuous ride along the St. Lawrence River between Quebec City and Levis. Find out which team will win against the cold and icy Canadian conditions!

programme.title: International Rafting Federation World Championship - Episode 1
programme.desc: International Rafting Federation World Championship - Episode 1

programme.title: World Rowing Coastal Championship - Episode 1
programme.desc: Competition has docked in Vancouver for the 2019 World Rowing Coastal Championship. An endurance test like no other, the event has buoy turns usually with a minimum distance of 4000m. With the stunning background of Vancouver Island, the World Champion of seven different boat classes will be crowned in this final.Watch the best moments of the 2019 competition of the World Rowing Coastal Championship.

programme.title: Young & Wild [Extreme Wildwater Kayaking]
programme.desc: Young & Wild [Extreme Wildwater Kayaking]

programme.title: Stockholm Archipelago Raid
programme.desc: The Stockholm Archipelago Raid is for participants a unique orienteering race in Europe as it offers a mix of sport, nature and adventure to athletes. This archipelago is the largest in Europe, with 36,000 rocks, skerries and islands, as well as one of the most difficult for navigation. There are still islands and groups of islands where no sail race has ever passed due to their remote location or because they are bird or seal protection areas.Experienced sailors from all over the world gather in the heart of Sweden as it hosts the first F18 Raid World ever. Winners will be crowned as the best long distance F18 raid sailors in the world, marking history in this nautical sport.Watch the Stockholm Archipelago Raid on Nautical Channel and discover the limitless possibilities of this Raid for brave competitors that will race in these remote islands.

programme.title: Skeleton Sea
programme.desc: João and Xandi, two surfers in their early 50′s, have been working together for 25 years. They clean beaches and with the trash they pick they create the most stunning artwork. However, living as an artist and idealist in Portugal is not economically profitable and, therefore, not easy.Their family life is affected by the choices they make and their wish to raise awareness about the ever-growing pollution in our oceans. Skeleton Sea takes us on their personal journey to help people understand the importance of our oceans to help us take the step to change our habits to keep them clean. As all live comes from the sea, Skeleton Sea reminds us that this powerful force has the ability of taking it away from us as well.

programme.title: Flavours of Venice - Episode 3
programme.desc: We have approached the end of the series, and in this final episode Andi will be experiencing the art of glass blowing on the island of Murano. Then, she will enjoy a vegan meal prepared on board that has been paired with coffee instead of wine. Let's dive into the flavours of Venice!

programme.title: Moana Waiwai
programme.desc: Moana Waiwai follows the Free Swim journey of wahine (woman) Ally Davey as she takes on 70km of open ocean around the stunning Coromandel coastline to bring awareness to the protection of New Zealand’s oceans.For over three days it does more than encapsulate stunning panoramas on the extraordinary scenario of New Zealand. It is also inspiring for people as we become aware of the natural beauty of the ocean so we can protect it before it is too late.This is an inspirational film, not an activist propaganda, that highlights exploration and the intrinsic benefits of getting wet and looking below the surface. In Moana Waiwai Ally Davey will champion endurance of her human spirit in this seemingly impossible task to achieve a higher goal: protection of the oceans.Be part of her adventure on Nautical Channel.

programme.title: EcoFin Documentary
programme.desc: “We’re just two surfers that decided we could no longer ignore plastic pollution in our oceans.” –Luise Grossmann.Two young innovators created the first sustainable surfboard fin based on ocean-recycled plastics. The founders of FiveOceans give ocean rubbish a new life, using plastic collected from the Indian Ocean, proving it is possible to close the cycle with ocean waste and high quality surf gear.In this stunning documentary, they prove their mission and reveal a transparent value chain of the waste material to design a performance product for surfers. With their background in engineering, the unrivalled story is underlined by surfing, adventure and great personalities as the two friends battle their way to achieve a much higher goal: reducing the plastic that ends up in the oceans they surf.

programme.title: Vilanculos Downwind
programme.desc: We are in Mozambique, the southern African paradise with the long Indian Ocean coastline to its side. Mozambique is not only filled with popular beaches and offshore marine parks, but also incredible windsurfing spots. On this occasion, we celebrate Vilanculos Downwind, a never before done 20 kilometer kitesurf race from the mainland of Mozambique to Bazaruto Island.Join the windsurfers that will journey in the tricky Indian Ocean and race to reach the island of Bazaruto. Departing from the city of Vilanculos, they head for a journey downwind like no other. Don’t miss this once-in-a-lifetime experience, on Nautical Channel.

programme.title: Kite Masters - Episode 3
programme.desc: Kite Masters - Episode 3

programme.title: Kite Masters - Episode 4
programme.desc: Right after Weifang, some of the world's top riders flew to Pingtan for the 2017 IKA TwinTip World Championship, together with 2017 KiteFoil GoldCup - ACT3... and so did Kite Masters. Pingtan is the place where it all started for Kiteboarding in China. The first Kiteboarding School was established in Pingtan's sandy beach, helping develop the sport in every way. Since then, thousands of new riders have joined this exciting sport in China.

Majestic and mystical; ethereal; elegant yet unpolished; and truly authentic.In this episode, we will visit Halki’s capital, Emborio and we will explore, with captain George, all the natural hidden treasures of the island.We are set to discover deep caves, bask on Trahia and Kania beach, and explore Alimia islet. We will visit an abandoned village, learning more about its rich history, and scuba dive down to the sea floor to get closer to a legendary shipwreck.Still untouched by mass tourism, Halki is the perfect destination for relaxing holidays away from the bright lights or for a quick getaway from the island of Rhodes. Watch Discovering Halki to become part of this almost untouched territory that is worth visiting.

programme.title: Brilliant Corners Jamaica
programme.desc: The Caribbean is filled with places where tourism is rare or close to non-existent. However, there is so much potential for cultural and water sports tourism, they are called Brilliant corners. With a sustainable tourism approach, get ready to live a fully local experience on Brilliant Corners Jamaica while we practice water sports, taste the traditional local dishes and talk with the habitants of the area.On this occasion, we venture into Jamaica: the third-largest island of the Greater Antilles and Caribbean, home to famous personalities like Bob Marley or Usain Bolt. Through extreme surf travel and consequent writing and aestheticized by jazz, Sam Bleakley gives a voice to the brilliant corners of this country, revealing the character of the place by getting inside the mind of a coastline as much as people.Immerse yourself in the beauty of the yet to discover areas of the Caribbean, available on Nautical Channel.

programme.title: Skeleton Sea

However, living as an artist and idealist in Portugal is not economically profitable and, therefore, not easy.Their family life is affected by the choices they make and their wish to raise awareness about the ever-growing pollution in our oceans. programme.title: Kite Masters - Episode 4
programme.desc: Right after Weifang, some of the world's top riders flew to Pingtan for the 2017 IKA TwinTip World Championship, together with 2017 KiteFoil GoldCup - ACT3... and so did Kite Masters. Pingtan is the place where it all started for Kiteboarding in China. The first Kiteboarding School was established in Pingtan's sandy beach, helping develop the sport in every way. programme.title: Stockholm Archipelago Raid
programme.desc: The Stockholm Archipelago Raid is for participants a unique orienteering race in Europe as it offers a mix of sport, nature and adventure to athletes. This archipelago is the largest in Europe, with 36,000 rocks, skerries and islands, as well as one of the most difficult for navigation. There are still islands and groups of islands where no sail race has ever passed due to their remote location or because they are bird or seal protection areas.Experienced sailors from all over the world gather in the heart of Sweden as it hosts the first F18 Raid World ever. Winners will be crowned as the best long distance F18 raid sailors in the world, marking history in this nautical sport.Watch the Stockholm Archipelago Raid on Nautical Channel and discover the limitless possibilities of this Raid for brave competitors that will race in these remote islands.

programme.title: Les Voiles de Saint Tropez - Episode 2 - Meeting and Sailing at Les Voiles De St Tropez
programme.desc: Marking the end of the Mediterranean yachting season, Les Voiles de Saint Tropez will be back for its 20th edition. Close to 4,000 sailors and more than 300 sailing yachts will gather in St Tropez in early autumn for an action-packed programme of competitive racing and lively social events.

programme.title: H2O Racing: Aquabike World Championship - Episode 3 Olbia, ITALY
programme.desc: With 150 competitors from over 30 countries, the UIM ABP Tour is ready for another weekend of non-stop action with the elite riders, joined by new riders competing in the single events of the UIM ABP Aquabike World Championship. In this episode, we are ready to see all the ski action in the Grand Prix of Italy taking place in Olbia.Come join us in this beautiful holiday destination that attracted international riders for the world champion title.

programme.title: What Sup - Episode 4
programme.desc: Welcome back for the fourth episode of What SUP!
