programme.desc: Polo Rider Cup - Behind the Goals - Episode 1

programme.title: Horse Academy Pro - Chapter 1
programme.desc: We begin this chapter rating and voting the student boxes organization at the stables and learning some tips on how horses should be taken care of in the stables. We will clean our equipment properly before feeding the horses and then we will be receiving Doctor Menegon, the voice for the Italian and International horse-riding competitions and introducing our special guest Rolf-Göran Bengtsson. Tune in on the Episode 2 Chapter 1 of Horse Academy Pro, exclusively on HorseTV!

programme.title: UAX Trophy - Ep 1
programme.desc: UAX Trophy - Ep 1

programme.title: FEI Ride Show - Episode 1
programme.desc: Welcome to RIDE, a brand-new series from FEI Originals that takes a deeper look into the equestrian world. On this week's episode, we hear from Australian Eventer, Megan Jones, on how her family and her dealt with the bushfire crisis. We also go behind the scenes on the set of the children's horse drama "Mystic" but first of all, we being in Florida to find out more about a very particular equine therapy programme.

programme.title: FEI Ride Show - Episode 2
programme.desc: In this episode we find out why Danish Show Jumper Tina Lund decided to move to the UAE. Also, we dive deeper into Florida's blossoming equestrian fitness scene. Daniel Bachmann Andersen will give us an update on his latest career move but before then, we will hear from Indian Eventer Fouaad Mirza about his passion for horses and sport.

programme.title: Jumping International de Dinard - Tropicana Derby of Dinard
programme.desc: The mythical Tropicana Derby is one of the categories inside the Jumping International de Dinard, and it offers a combination of traditional and natural fences over a particularly long distance of 1100m that will bring both horse and rider to their limit. Relive the best moments of Dinards Tropicana Derby with a jumping height over 1.45m.

programme.desc: Longines FEI Jumping Nations Cup - Abu Dhabi

programme.title: CSI-W 5* La Coruna Longines Trophy - Longines Trophy
programme.desc: Follow the Longines Trophy challenge over 1.50m in the World Cup qualifier of La Coruna. A competition like no other that ranks in the highest difficulty at CSI5* making it of the most demanding classes on the international circuit. The CSI-W5* La Coruna Longines Trophy is a competition that brings the best riders together under harsh conditions to prove their excellent skills. Who will end up in the podium?Watch the 2019 season on Horse TV.

programme.title: CSI-W 5* La Coruna Longines Trophy - Longines Trophy
programme.desc: Follow the Longines Trophy challenge over 1.50m in the World Cup qualifier of La Coruna. A competition like no other that ranks in the highest difficulty at CSI5* making it of the most demanding classes on the international circuit. The CSI-W5* La Coruna Longines Trophy is a competition that brings the best riders together under harsh conditions to prove their excellent skills. Who will end up in the podium?Watch the 2019 season on Horse TV.

programme.title: FEI Ride Show - Episode 1
programme.desc: Welcome to RIDE, a brand-new series from FEI Originals that takes a deeper look into the equestrian world. On this week's episode, we hear from Australian Eventer, Megan Jones, on how her family and her dealt with the bushfire crisis. We also go behind the scenes on the set of the children's horse drama "Mystic" but first of all, we being in Florida to find out more about a very particular equine therapy programme.

programme.title: FEI Ride Show - Episode 2
programme.desc: In this episode we find out why Danish Show Jumper Tina Lund decided to move to the UAE. Also, we dive deeper into Florida's blossoming equestrian fitness scene. Daniel Bachmann Andersen will give us an update on his latest career move but before then, we will hear from Indian Eventer Fouaad Mirza about his passion for horses and sport.

programme.title: Horse Academy Pro - Chapter 1
programme.desc: We begin this chapter rating and voting the student boxes organization at the stables and learning some tips on how horses should be taken care of in the stables. We will clean our equipment properly before feeding the horses and then we will be receiving Doctor Menegon, the voice for the Italian and International horse-riding competitions and introducing our special guest Rolf-Göran Bengtsson. Tune in on the Episode 2 Chapter 1 of Horse Academy Pro, exclusively on HorseTV!

programme.title: Jumping International de Dinard - Tropicana Derby of Dinard
programme.desc: The mythical Tropicana Derby is one of the categories inside the Jumping International de Dinard, and it offers a combination of traditional and natural fences over a particularly long distance of 1100m that will bring both horse and rider to their limit. Relive the best moments of Dinards Tropicana Derby with a jumping height over 1.45m.

programme.title: Jumping International La Baule - Derby
programme.desc: The Derby at La Baule is an awaited event amongst horse enthusiasts. Classified as a CSIO 5*, competitors rush against the clock for a prize money of 40,000 euros. They will have to beat all sort of obstacles with a height of 1.45m across the field. The competition is hard and not all combinations are ready to challenge the fences, water and ramps in the way.Watch the best moments of the 2019 competition.

programme.title: Dressage Season Review - Episode 1
programme.desc: The best action in the dressage world is ready for the 2016/2017 edition. Riders prepare themselves for this arduous challenge that give us some of the most magical moments in equestrian sports. Be part of the excitement that moves across Europe, the Americas and the Pacific in the 2016/2017 Dressage World Cup Season.

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 1
programme.desc: In this month's show, we look back on Boyd Exell's memorable 2018 driving season and travel to Reykjavik to learn more about the Icelandic Horse breed. Also, we will be visiting Gina Schumacher in Geneva to catch up on the action from the Longines FEI World Cup Jumping series. Welcome to FEI Equestrian World.

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 2
programme.desc: This time, we are in Bordeaux to find out who will be crowned the FEI Driving World Cup Champion and we return to Iceland to learn more about their equine enterprises. We will also visit one of the leading coachbuilders in the world to see how horseboxes are made and travel to Abu Dhabi for the series opener of the Longines FEI Jumping Nations Cup.

programme.title: FEI Ride Show - Episode 3
programme.desc: In this week's episode we go to Germany. Here, we will meet the award winning equine photographer Carina Maiwald. Later, the Scottish war veteran, Harry Marshall tells us his story and how horses helped him with PTSD. But before all this, we begin our journey in the heart of London at the Ebony Horse Club to find out more about horse riding and its benefits to children.

programme.title: FEI Ride Show - Episode 4
programme.desc: The Mexican Show Jumper Eugenio Garza Perez takes us on a stable tour at El Milagro. Then, paralympic Dressage Gold Medallist Natasha Baker takes to the slopes, and we find out how the Swedish Eventing Team have been working through the coronavirus pandemic. Lastly, we hear from British Eventer Laura Collett after her first five star win at Pau.

programme.title: Longines Global Champions Tour - Episode 3 - Mexico City
programme.desc: Mexico City welcomes the third leg of the 2022 edition of the Longines Global Champions Tour. Riders have already been able to test each other skills twice, so now that they know how high the level is, they are eager to push even harder to score higher in the standings. programme.title: Global Champions League - Episode 3 - Mexico City
programme.desc: We travel to Mexico City for the third leg of the 2022 Global Champions League circuit. Riders team up to earn more points and get closer to the podium in this competition that travels around all continents. They will have to perform perfectly on the first round and then do their best during the jump-off. However, sometimes doing their best is not enough, as this competition expects them to do the extraordinary.

programme.title: CSIO Roma Piazza di Siena
programme.desc: Obstacles do not exist, only adventures to continue challenging and testing yourself. At least, this is the philosophy we like to follow at the CSIO Roma Piazza di Siena. On Horse TV we have the highlights of the competition. Find out when it will broadcast next!

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 1
programme.desc: In this month's show, we look back on Boyd Exell's memorable 2018 driving season and travel to Reykjavik to learn more about the Icelandic Horse breed. Also, we will be visiting Gina Schumacher in Geneva to catch up on the action from the Longines FEI World Cup Jumping series. Welcome to FEI Equestrian World.

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 2
programme.desc: This time, we are in Bordeaux to find out who will be crowned the FEI Driving World Cup Champion and we return to Iceland to learn more about their equine enterprises. We will also visit one of the leading coachbuilders in the world to see how horseboxes are made and travel to Abu Dhabi for the series opener of the Longines FEI Jumping Nations Cup.

programme.title: FEI Ride Show - Episode 3
programme.desc: In this week's episode we go to Germany. Here, we will meet the award winning equine photographer Carina Maiwald. Later, the Scottish war veteran, Harry Marshall tells us his story and how horses helped him with PTSD. But before all this, we begin our journey in the heart of London at the Ebony Horse Club to find out more about horse riding and its benefits to children.

programme.title: FEI Ride Show - Episode 4
programme.desc: The Mexican Show Jumper Eugenio Garza Perez takes us on a stable tour at El Milagro. Then, paralympic Dressage Gold Medallist Natasha Baker takes to the slopes, and we find out how the Swedish Eventing Team have been working through the coronavirus pandemic. Lastly, we hear from British Eventer Laura Collett after her first five star win at Pau.

programme.title: Horse Academy Pro - Chapter 2
programme.desc: Get ready for a ride with us in this new episode of Horse Academy Pro! This time, Rolf Göran-Bengtsson will be teaching us how to make proper turns and students will be practicing jumps in a closed circuit with their horses. They will be increasing the height as students get better, will they be capable to adapt quickly to Bengtsson's teachings? Find it out on this exclusive show on HorseTV.

programme.title: Jumping International La Baule - Derby
programme.desc: The Derby at La Baule is an awaited event amongst horse enthusiasts. Classified as a CSIO 5*, competitors rush against the clock for a prize money of 40,000 euros. They will have to beat all sort of obstacles with a height of 1.45m across the field. The competition is hard and not all combinations are ready to challenge the fences, water and ramps in the way.Watch the best moments of the 2019 competition.

programme.title: CSIO Roma Piazza di Siena
programme.desc: Obstacles do not exist, only adventures to continue challenging and testing yourself. At least, this is the philosophy we like to follow at the CSIO Roma Piazza di Siena. This Official International Competition includes a Nations Cup competition, and the oval of Piazza di Siena is the chosen venue for this incredible display of pure skills.Land Rover is once again the proud sponsor accompanying riders and their horses on their adventure.Want to watch it? On Horse TV we have the highlights of the competition. Find out when it will broadcast next!

programme.title: Vaulting Season Review - Review
programme.desc: Vaulters seek the chance to make it to Dortmund, Germany, and compete in the Vaulting 2016-2017 season final. However, before getting to the German city, they have to qualify in the events taking place all over Europe. Competing in Individual Female, Individual Male and Pas-de-Deux, vaulters will prove they bond with their horses in an incredible performance.Enjoy the best moments of the 2016-2017 vaulting season.

programme.title: Longines Global Champions Tour Madrid Copa del Rey - Highlights
programme.desc: We are transported this time to sunny Spain for this mesmerising battle. This is the destination where the Longines Global Champions Tour Madrid Copa del Rey takes place. The Spanish facilities of the Club de Campo Villa de Madrid host a new edition of this competition.Welcoming show jumping riders from all over the world in an attempt to determine the champion of show jumping. This two-round challenge with over 1.55m will have spectators on the edge of their sits.Follow the Longines Global Champions Tour Madrid Copa del Rey to find out this year’s winner.

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 3
programme.desc: This time, we go to the United Arab Emirates with showjumper Abdullah Mohammed Al Marri and meet the next generation of farriers training at Myerscough College in the north west of England. Moreover, we reflect on the 2018 Longines FEI Jumping World Cup Final with defending champion Beezie Madden and we visit Ireland's dressage star Judy Reynolds in Germany.

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 4
programme.desc: In this month's episode, we go behind the scenes with Patrik Kittel at the FEI Dressage World Cup Final in Gothenburg and follow the action to find out who will become the champion the year. We will also meet some of the sport's top athletes who have their sights on lifting the Longines FEI Jumping World Cup trophy and catch up on all the vaulting action from the finals in Saumur, France.

Will they be able to reach the jump-off with no mistakes? Watch the best moments of the third leg in Mexico City.

programme.title: Global Champions League - Episode 3 - Mexico City
programme.desc: We travel to Mexico City for the third leg of the 2022 Global Champions League circuit. Riders team up to earn more points and get closer to the podium in this competition that travels around all continents. They will have to perform perfectly on the first round and then do their best during the jump-off. However, sometimes doing their best is not enough, as this competition expects them to do the extraordinary.

programme.title: Horse Academy Pro - Chapter 2
programme.desc: Get ready for a ride with us in this new episode of Horse Academy Pro! This time, Rolf Göran-Bengtsson will be teaching us how to make proper turns and students will be practicing jumps in a closed circuit with their horses. They will be increasing the height as students get better, will they be capable to adapt quickly to Bengtsson's teachings? Find it out on this exclusive show on HorseTV.

programme.title: FEI Ride Show - Episode 5
programme.desc: In this last episode of the season, we hear from Dressage Rider, Sonnar Murray-Brown about his rise in the sport to the top level. Then, we go to Australia to find out about the Equine Pathways program. Show Jumper William Funnell will tell us about The Billy Stud and we will see the incredible work done behind the World Horse Wellfare.

programme.desc: FEI Vaulting World Cup OMAHA - HIGHLIGTH

programme.title: Vaulting Season Review - Review
programme.desc: Vaulters seek the chance to make it to Dortmund, Germany, and compete in the Vaulting 2016-2017 season final. However, before getting to the German city, they have to qualify in the events taking place all over Europe. Competing in Individual Female, Individual Male and Pas-de-Deux, vaulters will prove they bond with their horses in an incredible performance.Enjoy the best moments of the 2016-2017 vaulting season.

programme.title: Longines Global Champions Tour Madrid Copa del Rey - Highlights
programme.desc: We are transported this time to sunny Spain for this mesmerising battle. This is the destination where the Longines Global Champions Tour Madrid Copa del Rey takes place. The Spanish facilities of the Club de Campo Villa de Madrid host a new edition of this competition.Welcoming show jumping riders from all over the world in an attempt to determine the champion of show jumping. This two-round challenge with over 1.55m will have spectators on the edge of their sits.Follow the Longines Global Champions Tour Madrid Copa del Rey to find out this year’s winner.

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 3
programme.desc: This time, we go to the United Arab Emirates with showjumper Abdullah Mohammed Al Marri and meet the next generation of farriers training at Myerscough College in the north west of England. Moreover, we reflect on the 2018 Longines FEI Jumping World Cup Final with defending champion Beezie Madden and we visit Ireland's dressage star Judy Reynolds in Germany.

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 4
programme.desc: In this month's episode, we go behind the scenes with Patrik Kittel at the FEI Dressage World Cup Final in Gothenburg and follow the action to find out who will become the champion the year. We will also meet some of the sport's top athletes who have their sights on lifting the Longines FEI Jumping World Cup trophy and catch up on all the vaulting action from the finals in Saumur, France.

programme.title: Longines Global Champions Tour - Episode 7 - Monaco
programme.desc: Monaco shines with glamour, luxury and exciting competitions, like the seventh leg of the 2021 Longines Global Champions Tour. Rewatch the highlights of the competition in Monaco, on HorseTV.

programme.title: Global Champions League - Episode 7 - Monaco
programme.desc: Monaco is the scenery for the seventh leg of the Global Champions League. St Tropez Pirates won the CSI5* competition at Paris, but Valkenswaard United is still at the lead of the overall standings of the competition. Will another team rise and shine in Monaco, or will it be another victory for Valkenswaard United? Find out now in the seventh leg of the 2021 GCL.

programme.title: Madrid Horse Week - Damm Trophy
programme.desc: The CSI5*W Damm Trophy is one of the toughest and most awaited competition during the Madrid Horse Week. With a maximum height of 1.55m, very few riders make it to the jump-off and competitors need to stay focussed from start to end. Will Portuguese rider Luciana Diniz repeat her 2019 success with Vertigo du Desert? Let's find out in the 2021 edition of the CSI5*-W Estrella Damm Trophy.

programme.title: FEI Jumping World Cup - Review
programme.desc: FEI Jumping World Cup - Review

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 5
programme.desc: We travel to the United States for the Land Rover Kentucky Three-Day event. Then, we talk with Animal Chiropractor Nika Vorster regarding the health of horses. Afterwards we will meet the family behind the historic Club Hipico in Coapexpan, Mexico, and catch up on the latest action from the Longines FEI Jumping Nations Cup series.

programme.title: FEI Equestrian World - Episode 6
programme.desc: In this week's episode we are in Canada to find out who qualified for the Longines FEI Jumping Nations Cup Final in the North and Central America and Caribbean division. Then, we visit Mount St John Equestrian in Yorkshire, England, to learn about the breeding of dressage horses. We will also visit a therapeutic riding school on Vancouver Island before catching up on the action from the FEI Eventing Nations Cup. Don't miss out!

programme.title: San Saba

programme.title: Universal Soldier II: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: Luc and Veronica recover and revive Luc's long-lost brother who has been suspended in a cryo-chamber for decades and attempt to expose the Unisol program, led by Mazur (Gary Busey), which recycles dead soldiers in the attempt to create the ultimate mercenary army.

programme.title: 12 Hours to Live

programme.title: Yoga Is Joy
programme.desc: Open your heart to an experience of pure joy. We’ll use Happy Baby pose to explore what yoga truly is. Flow through child’s pose, puppy pose, squats and hip openers before making your way into the sweet release of Happy Baby. No judgement, no fight, no force… use this practice to touch the unscathed, joyful innocence within you.

programme.title: Yoga Is Sanctuary
programme.desc: Today’s lesson is about sanctuary and how to find a place of calm and peace deep within yourself. We’ll use the backbend Ustrasana, or Camel Pose, to dive into that inner world. Kino will guide you through warm ups and then a series of backbends that will challenge you. The idea is to work outside of your comfort zone, just a little, so you seek a source of strength from deep within. As you embrace the challenge you can also embrace a sense of sanctuary and connect to an inner space of faith and grace.

programme.title: Yoga and Indian Culture with Ajay Tokas

programme.desc: It’s a spin on Orange Chicken – learn how to make this delicious, crispy orange cauliflower with Alexa Soto.

programme.title: Yoga Nidra for Healing
programme.desc: Join Irene for a Yoga Nidra practice is designed to promote healing in the body from the inside out.

programme.title: Handstands
programme.desc: Join Kino for 20 minutes of Handstand drills! Not recommended for beginners, this class does require a certain level of pre-established strength and flexibility. Work through these drills every week to take your handstand practice to the next level

programme.title: Bridge
programme.desc: This practice takes you on a journey through the fundamentals of yoga and culminates in a gentle backbend, the bridge pose

programme.title: Kino in Seattle
programme.desc: I don’t think we’re in Florida anymore! Follow along with Kino during her trip to Seattle, Washington as she adjusts to the colder weather, sets off in search of a hot cup of chai, tours historic areas like the Gas Works Park, supports local businesses, and shares the Ashtanga Yoga method with a group of excited yogis at the Yoga Lab Northwest.

programme.title: Yoga Is Breath
programme.desc: Tune into the truth of who you are underneath the thoughts, using the breath and practice as a means of transformation into true self. This class uses chair pose to explore both physical embodiment and to fuel our inner journey into yoga. Join us for a practice that will bring awareness into your hips and legs, using props to support the postures where needed. Let Kino guide you into a stronger awareness of Agni, the inner fire that burns through impurities and helps the mind see clearer.

programme.desc: A practice that builds up to tree pose. Get rooted into the fundamentals of yoga practice including breath and balance.

programme.desc: Come explore supported hip opening with Kino. This class incorporates yoga fundamentals and builds up to Pigeon Pose.

programme.title: Body Intelligence Trailer
programme.desc: Body Intelligence Trailer

programme.title: Twist - The Heart - Feel
programme.desc: The final class in this series is all about feeling into and entering the heart space through the vehicle of twists. The unfelt body is a reservoir of the unlived life. Unlock your potential for healing by connecting with these deep inner spaces of the body and just feeling.

programme.title: Eat Like a Yogi - Meditation for Kapha
programme.desc: As you’ve learned, Ayurveda recommends different yoga and meditation practices for each of the doshas. In this episode, Sahara Rose will guide you through a meditation that’s designed specifically for Kapha type people.

programme.title: Personal Relationships
programme.desc: Join Kino for a 20 minute meditation on love and tuning into the flow of love in personal relationships. Begin your practice of mindful awareness by feeling the breath. Allow the breath to become an anchor that redirects the mind to the inner experience. Check in with the physical body and the sensations arising there and filtering into awareness. Tap into the energy of the heart and the love that flows there, allow this feeling to spread to all beings and yourself.

programme.title: Yoga Is Unity
programme.desc: The traditional definition of yoga is unity. We will explore this concept through the restorative Pigeon Pose. Begin practice with a reflection on the connection between breath, body and mind. Next, move through a series of long holds in child’s pose, puppy poses and forward folding. Take a supported hip opener using props if you have them handy and then move into another long hold, this time in Pigeon Pose. Take note of any sensations and feelings that arise, offering yourself true care and opening up to a sense of wholeness.

programme.title: Material relationships
programme.desc: Start your meditation practice with a few moments of mindful awareness built around the movement of the breath and the sensations of the body. Cultivate equanimity as you notice the rise and fall of physical and emotional feelings. Let Kino help you drop down beneath the frequency of thought, where you can get in touch with your innate wholeness. Work with understanding your natural completeness, as you explore concepts of attachment and aversion. Find yourself in alignment with faith, breaking the inertia of limiting beliefs and thoughts. Practice towards a state of non attachment, a fertile ground in which to plant the seeds of a happier, more peaceful life.

programme.title: Sun Salutations
programme.desc: Join Mark for a class that investigates the main movement positions in the traditional Sun Salutations.

programme.title: Yoga Is Mindfulness
programme.desc: Today we go deeper into understanding what yoga is as we explore mindfulness and the pose Trikonasana. Join Kino as she guides you through a physical practice with a focus on remaining present and judgement free. Use triangle pose as an opportunity to be present with and accepting towards whatever arises in the body and mind as you practice.

programme.title: Everyday Drill
programme.desc: When it comes to building strength and flexibility for a more well-rounded yoga practice, yoga drills can help you expedite the process! Join Kino for a set of yoga drills that offer a little mix of everything. Stretch out and strengthen the core, legs, arms, shoulders, and everything in between. Just over 20 minutes.

programme.title: Healing and Happiness
programme.desc: Begin practice with a few minutes of mindfulness, feeling the breath and sensation in the body as a way of cultivating inward focus. Shift into a contemplative state, settling the mind below the frequency of thought. Learn to label inner processes in a way that will help you understand the nature of thought and emotion. As the quality of your awareness shifts deeper, Kino will skillfully guide you into a state of contemplation. This practice will help you process emotion and move towards healing and happiness.

programme.title: Yoga Inspiration Podcast - A conversation about communication
programme.desc: Kino sits down to talk with mediator and coach Mia Forbes Pirie. Mia discusses her approach to mediation and gives advice about how to use curiosity to navigate interpersonal conflict. Explore techniques to help you approach life with patience and compassion of yourself and others.

programme.title: How to Become a Rich Yogi - How to quiet our mind
programme.desc: True peace is something that exists inside of you at all times, but the only way to access this peace is by learning to quiet the mind. So how do you do it? Watch the video to find out!

programme.title: Parsvottanasana
programme.desc: This 20 minute practice starts with the basics, building a connection to breath and body. Flow through standing poses that build up to a prop supported variation of Parsvottanasana.

programme.title: Bridge
programme.desc: This practice takes you on a journey through the fundamentals of yoga and culminates in a gentle backbend, the bridge pose

programme.title: Backbend - Listen
programme.desc: Join Kino for as class that’s all about backbends and the journey of listening. Begin to tap into the subtle body as you move through this mindful, 25-minute backbending practice. Talk to your muscles and joints and listen to them as you find the strength and flexibility to move through this practice, all while bringing your awareness to various places in the body.

programme.title: Yoga Is Commitment
programme.desc: This class centers around commitment, so Kino is asking you start by going all in. The intention here is to get you on your mat every day, even if you don’t make it through the whole class, so that you can cultivate greater awareness of your body and mind. In this class we’ll build up to a steady, well constructed Down Dog by focusing on the shoulders in a series of preparatory postures. Flow through child's pose, table top, puppy pose and sun salutations as you create healthy patterns of movement and breath control. The commitment you make to the practice is really a statement of your self worth. Join Kino on the mat and say: I am worth it! I am worth these few moments of precious practice.

Cultivate equanimity as you notice the rise and fall of physical and emotional feelings. Let Kino help you drop down beneath the frequency of thought, where you can get in touch with your innate wholeness. Work with understanding your natural completeness, as you explore concepts of attachment and aversion. Find yourself in alignment with faith, breaking the inertia of limiting beliefs and thoughts. Practice towards a state of non attachment, a fertile ground in which to plant the seeds of a happier, more peaceful life.

programme.title: Sun Salutations
programme.desc: Join Mark for a class that investigates the main movement positions in the traditional Sun Salutations.

programme.title: Yoga Is Mindfulness
programme.desc: Today we go deeper into understanding what yoga is as we explore mindfulness and the pose Trikonasana. Join Kino as she guides you through a physical practice with a focus on remaining present and judgement free. Use triangle pose as an opportunity to be present with and accepting towards whatever arises in the body and mind as you practice.

programme.title: Connecting to the Soul
programme.desc: Kino sits down to talk with Koya Webb about her southern roots and her California life.

programme.title: Naturally Bliss Trailer
programme.desc: Naturally Bliss Trailer

programme.title: Meet Alexa
programme.desc: Alexa Soto turned her passion for cooking into a way of life.

programme.title: Alfredo Mushroom Pasta
programme.desc: Vegan fettuccine alfredo is easier to make than you might think.

programme.title: Avocado Fudge Brownies
programme.desc: These avocado fudge brownies are so rich and decadent; you won’t believe they’re vegan!

programme.title: Yoga Is Joy
programme.desc: Open your heart to an experience of pure joy. We’ll use Happy Baby pose to explore what yoga truly is. Flow through child’s pose, puppy pose, squats and hip openers before making your way into the sweet release of Happy Baby. No judgement, no fight, no force… use this practice to touch the unscathed, joyful innocence within you.

programme.title: Yoga Drills Trailer
programme.desc: Yoga Drills Trailer

programme.title: Everyday Drill
programme.desc: When it comes to building strength and flexibility for a more well-rounded yoga practice, yoga drills can help you expedite the process! Join Kino for a set of yoga drills that offer a little mix of everything. Stretch out and strengthen the core, legs, arms, shoulders, and everything in between. Just over 20 minutes.

programme.title: Healing and Happiness
programme.desc: Begin practice with a few minutes of mindfulness, feeling the breath and sensation in the body as a way of cultivating inward focus. Shift into a contemplative state, settling the mind below the frequency of thought. Learn to label inner processes in a way that will help you understand the nature of thought and emotion. As the quality of your awareness shifts deeper, Kino will skillfully guide you into a state of contemplation. This practice will help you process emotion and move towards healing and happiness.

programme.title: Yoga Inspiration Podcast - A conversation about communication
programme.desc: Kino sits down to talk with mediator and coach Mia Forbes Pirie. Mia discusses her approach to mediation and gives advice about how to use curiosity to navigate interpersonal conflict. Explore techniques to help you approach life with patience and compassion of yourself and others.

programme.title: How to Become a Rich Yogi - How to quiet our mind
programme.desc: True peace is something that exists inside of you at all times, but the only way to access this peace is by learning to quiet the mind. So how do you do it? Watch the video to find out!

programme.title: Parsvottanasana
programme.desc: This 20 minute practice starts with the basics, building a connection to breath and body. Flow through standing poses that build up to a prop supported variation of Parsvottanasana.

programme.title: Bridge
programme.desc: This practice takes you on a journey through the fundamentals of yoga and culminates in a gentle backbend, the bridge pose

programme.title: Backbend - Listen
programme.desc: Join Kino for as class that’s all about backbends and the journey of listening. Begin to tap into the subtle body as you move through this mindful, 25-minute backbending practice. Talk to your muscles and joints and listen to them as you find the strength and flexibility to move through this practice, all while bringing your awareness to various places in the body.

programme.title: Chef Emeril Lagasse
programme.desc: Kick it up a notch in the kitchen with Chef Emeril's cookware, appliances, cutlery and food.

programme.title: tarte Cosmetics Celebration
programme.desc: Level-up your beauty routine with the natural, high performance results of tarte Cosmetics.

programme.title: Wicker Park - Indoor & Outdoor Faux Florals
programme.desc: Cultivating a beautiful garden can be as simple as placing an everlasting, floral piece during Wicker Park - Indoor & Outdoor Faux Florals. Whether you're looking for an easier way to beautify your home, yard or overcome the difficult task of planting in the shade, Wicker Park offers elevated faux floral pieces that can be scaled for any nook, cranny, patio, or planter. From plant bed fillers, to hanging baskets, potted arrangements, greenery and more, Wicker Park - Indoor & Outdoor Faux Florals offers a vibrant alternative for your home and garden endeavors.

programme.title: Perlier Beauty Celebration
programme.desc: HSN beauty authority Rebecca is opening up her BIG beauty bag of secrets & sharing them ALL with you!

programme.title: the List with Debbie D - Birthday Celebration
programme.desc: Shop with host Debbie D for fashion, footwear, accessories, and beauty, hand-picked just for you.

programme.title: LifeStyled - Mauve & Suave Cooking featuring Le Creuset
programme.desc: Are you suffering from inspiration frustration? Is your dream aesthetic just...well, a dream? No more! It’s time to make your vision a reality during LifeStyled. Whether you’re picturing something mild, wild, or anywhere in between, we’re got the simple steps and on-trend finds to take your look from drab to fab. Level up everything from your wardrobe to your home as you shop leading brands in fashion, decor, and more that effortlessly elevate your space and give you the look you’ve been searching for. It’s streaming free, only on QVC+ and HSN+.

programme.title: David's Recipe Corner - Bacon, Egg & Sweet Potato Casserole
programme.desc: If you’re a fan of the recipes on In the Kitchen with David® or an avid reader of Program Host David Venable’s best-selling cookbooks, David’s Recipe Corner is the place for you! Every month, grab your apron and watch, shop, and cook along with QVC's Resident Foodie as he guides you through step-by-step recipes that are as easy to make as they are delicious—PLUS the brands that make preparing them a breeze. And it’s all streaming free, only on QVC+.

programme.title: Lorna Maseko Kitchen Celebration
programme.desc: Cook & serve chic-ly! Celebrity Chef Lorna Maseko brings a touch of the unique to your kitchen.

programme.title: Birkenstock Footwear - All On Free Shipping
programme.desc: Discover the original contoured footbed and iconic style of Birkenstock

programme.title: Getting Grilled with Curtis Stone - Kelly Hu
programme.desc: Things are heating up on Getting Grilled with Curtis Stone – an original video podcast show that will give you something to chew on. Join award-winning chef and the man behind one of the top-rated brands on HSN®, Curtis Stone, as he puts his guests from the worlds of film, music, sports, and beyond in the hot seat. Together, they’re cooking up flavorful convos—and foods—and digging into everything from current events to personal stories, to meals that left their mark. Whether you consider yourself a foodie, a pop culture expert, or somewhere in between, there’s sure to be a (sound) bite for you – streaming free, only on HSN+.

programme.title: HSN Gets Crafty - Stamps By Me with Toni Darroch
programme.desc: Whether you are an experienced crafter or just getting started, HSN Gets Crafty with Suzanne is your home for connecting with the crafting community and learning together.

programme.title: Gourmet Holiday® - Foodie Travel Series
programme.desc: Make every day a Gourmet Holiday with delicious sweets, meats and treats delivered right to your door - or some else's! From crab cakes to cheesecakes, we'll bring you a mouthwatering menu of easy-to-make and ready-to-serve food sure to delight family, friends and especially you! Whether you're preparing a holiday meal, a backyard BBQ, tailgate or an intimate dinner for two, you can make every meal special with the delectable entrees, snacks, desserts, wine and more you'll find in Gourmet Holiday.

programme.title: Beauty Report with Amy Morrison
programme.desc: null

programme.title: #GettheLook - Get Ali Carr’s Beauty Tips
programme.desc: Build a better beauty routine in real time with perfect products and helpful how-tos during #GettheLook, only on QVC+ and HSN+. Follow along for shoppable, step-by-step demos featuring the latest looks and deals on the beauty bag essentials you need to effortlessly achieve them. And don’t worry – watch, shop, and practice along with past episodes anytime, anywhere, only on QVC+ and HSN+.

programme.title: TWRHLL by Christie Brinkley Fashions
programme.desc: TWRHLL by Christie Brinkley Fashions

programme.title: Dishin' It - Magic Moments featuring MacKenzie-Childs
programme.desc: Pull up a chair and get ready to dig into the tastiest talk show because these foodies are Dishin’ It out! Pull up to the most popular potluck in town where our hungry hosts are bringing you the beginner-friendly recipes they’ve been craving—as well as the how-tos, brands, and products you need to serve them up yourself! It’s a full course meal featuring food, fun, and friends. Watch and shop, only on the free QVC+ and HSN+ streaming service.

programme.title: Adam's Open House
programme.desc: Join Adam as he unpacks all you need to take care of YOU from our new home at HSN PA!

programme.title: Breaking Barriers
programme.desc: In a world where faith and mental health often intersect, "Breaking Barriers: Seeking Help for Mental Health" aims to shatter the stigma surrounding accessing resources for your mental health. This powerful documentary delves into the misconception that reaching out for professional help is a sign of weakness, emphasizing that true healing often requires a blend of faith, prayer, and professional support. Through heartfelt interviews with mental health professionals, spiritual leaders, and individuals who have faced mental health challenges, the documentary paints a vivid picture of hope and resilience. Viewers will hear personal stories of struggle and triumph, learn from those who have lost loved ones to suicide, and discover actionable solutions to combat the ongoing mental health crisis in our communities.

programme.title: Breaking Barriers
programme.desc: In a world where faith and mental health often intersect, "Breaking Barriers: Seeking Help for Mental Health" aims to shatter the stigma surrounding accessing resources for your mental health. This powerful documentary delves into the misconception that reaching out for professional help is a sign of weakness, emphasizing that true healing often requires a blend of faith, prayer, and professional support. Through heartfelt interviews with mental health professionals, spiritual leaders, and individuals who have faced mental health challenges, the documentary paints a vivid picture of hope and resilience. Viewers will hear personal stories of struggle and triumph, learn from those who have lost loved ones to suicide, and discover actionable solutions to combat the ongoing mental health crisis in our communities.

programme.title: Temples Dot The Land
programme.desc: Utah will soon have 28 operating temples. Some are still under construction, restoration or in the Open House period. A few have recently been dedicated. In this program, we will focus on the 14 newest temples in Utah by telling the stories of the people connected to them. We will also provide a historic look at the other 14 currently operating temples. We will bring you the words of leaders of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints about this unprecedented time in temple building and what it says about the faith and worthiness of Church members who live in Utah.
